description:
Ever stop to think about how lucky you are that you fold your arms in half without breaking them? Flexible elbows are way more important than opposable thumbs and we never think twice about them. That all ends with Elbow Appreciation Day.

Come with your elbows splinted straight for an afternoon of drinks, snacks, and discussions of our body's most under-rated part. Limited supply of splits will be provided to those without.

Fair warning: You might need to find someone to feed you since you won't be able to reach your own mouth.
title: Elbow Appreciation Day
print_description: Ever think about how lucky you are that you can fold your arms in half? Enjoy drinks, snacks, armsplints and discuss our body's most under-rated part.

description: After three years of roaming the deep playa this mobile art installation has decided to settle down and start its roots at the Siberian Electric Company.  The Electric Lazy Lounge is more than a full sensory experience. Through its process of sensory overload it allows participants to disassociate from their sense of self and travel beyond this consciousness to a realm that can only be described as LazyLand. Combined with the incredible power of the playa's only nuclear reactor, the Siberian Electric Company, the Electric Lazy Lounge is stronger than ever and now capable of transporting participants beyond this universe into other dimensions of time and space.  Not only is the Electric Lazy Lounge the only way to get to LazyLand, it’s truly the best seat in the house. It will be open nightly with the bar.
title: Electric Lazy Lounge
print_description: Come free yourself from your physical manifestation and blast off into the mystical realm of LazyLand. Open nightly with the Siberian Electric Co. bar

description:
Join us every night at our Tron theme camp providing original music. DJ equipment,stage available for any DJ's that want to spin on our End of the Line Club replica stage. Come dance with us! Listen to the beats from our 25000w JBL SRX PA sound system! See our Recognizer out front, Tron Lightcyle art car and trip on our lasers and disco lights!
Think of it as a camp for renegade DJ’s or DJ’s without a home or anyone that just wants a chance to just do it and learn (we love to share our knowledge!). We have already spoken to and booked some large headliners for 2013, such as Ill Gates, Hatiras and I an K, Alex Lightspeed & Dirty V which all played on our stage in 2012 but were not promoted, to entertain anyone that wants to join us or as they just pass by.
title: End of Line Club PARTY!

description:

description:
The soulful conviction of Eric Hayes floods his audience with a hearty stew of rich tones and silky vibes. Even those whose thirst is never quenched cannot help but set down their drink, close their eyes and give in to the seductive musings of this rising star. Hailing from New Jersey, Eric Hayes is so much more than your all-American musician. His music possesses a stirring, earthy sound that leaves his fans aching for more. His voice is robust. His talent is pure. His passion is unmatched.

The 31 year old Far Hills native and William Paterson University music graduate has been the recipient of several positive reviews by prestigious critics and has been featured in the Star Ledger, New York Village Voice Magazine, New York Post, the ASPCA and a host of online blogs and pop culture media sites.

Hayes' credits include collaborating and performing with several big name artists such as Gavin Degraw, Martin Sexton, Bill Withers, Rusted Root, Indie artist Rachel Platten, Reggae legend Ziggy Marley and soul artist Joss Stone.

2013 has been and continues to be an incredible year for Hayes. He is truly humbled by the invitation to perform and share his music at Burning Man 2013 on the night the "Man Burns" for Black Rock City and such an incredible community of artists.

Hayes is well known for his musical charity work and has headlined exclusive events held by some of the world’s most elite circles of hosts including the opening dinner ceremony for the United States Olympic Wrestling Team and headlining the internationally recognized American Giving Awards winning "More Than Me" charity. 
He is inspired by both male and female artists including Otis Redding, Sam Cooke, Miles Davis, Jimi Hendrix, Susan Tedeschi and Radio Head. Recently Hayes performed at the annual ASPCA fund raising charity event, attracting more than 15,000 people, during which he reportedly helped friend and animal advocate Prince Lorenzo Borghese raise more than $50,000 for animal welfare.
title: Eric Hayes Live at Burning Man 2013
print_description:
Passionate. Powerful. Blue Eyed Soul.
The robust vocal conviction of NJ's Eric Hayes floods his audiences with rich tones and stirring, earthy vibes.

description:
Whips and floggers and chains, oh, my!  Well, maybe in the advanced course . . . but this one is about exploring lighter sensations with easily available objects.

What is Sensation Play?  Anything that's about feeling, from the soft caress of fur on your back to the sting of a crop on your butt.

	* Have you ever considered a kitchen whisk as a sex toy?
	* What's your most delightful experience with fingernails on a back?
	* Do you just use clothespins for hanging clothes???

What's your fantasy?  Your expertise?  Just curious?  Want to show off?

Bring your own partner and come explore with us.  Share your ideas and maybe your favorite household object turned kink toy.  Ask your questions.  Practice on someone.  Let someone practice on you!
We'll offer ideas and suggestions, and provide some toys.  Feel free to bring your own toys.  Just come ready to talk, share, watch, experience, have FUN, and generally enjoy some kink in the desert.

description: Exploring empathy as the capacity to lead us from an ecological dark age and inform the applications of genetics and bioremedation into society. This talk is an invigorating and inspiring synthesis of scientific discoveries, shamanic techniques, communications with animal, plant, planetary intelligence and transcending the "Other" with empathy as primary toolkit for understanding the biology and consciousness of different sentient organisms. Tapping into the ability of shamans to imagine themselves imbuing the traits of animals has been a valuable way for a consciousness to expand itself beyond its biological parameters as we reach the apex of the ecological collapse, and realize the potential to unlock new horizons of what it means to be human in a post human identity culture.
title: Exploring Biomorphic Empathy
print_description: Sara Huntley discusses empathy as the capacity to lead us from an ecological dark age and inform the applications of genetics and bioremediation.

description: You don't have to be on steroids to be able to hit a "homerun" in FIZZBALL!  All you really need to be able to do is to be able to beat the living shit out of a full can of really cheap beer giving the adoring crowds your best Barry Bonds imitation.  A case of crappy warm beer, soft underhanded tosses, and drunken half-naked (or fully naked!) people make for our own unique spinoff of our national pastime.  You drink what you hit and if you don't want warm suds cascading down on your sparkly playa finest, feel free to strip naked when it's your turn to be Casey At The Bat.  FIZZBALL at Barbie Death Camp.  A splendid time is guaranteed for all.  And remember:  Safety third.
title: FIZZBALL!
print_description: Can you beat the living shit out of a cheap can of beer?  Do drunken half naked people offend you? If not, join us in our daily game of FIZZBALL!

description: Facilitative interactive discussion on how to get to that place of bliss, happiness and joy by living your life from the Heart. Being conscious and involved and a participant in life as a creative being: at Burning Man and everywhere else you may find yourself.  Knowing it is the decisions and the choices that we make that direct us to our bliss!  Believing in our words, acknowledging our feelings, and realizing our actions, taken from our heart, as the source, is our true and only guide to happiness, bliss and joy. With Carol Foldvary-Anderson / varyCarol
title: Follow Your Bliss, Your Heart and Your Joy!
print_description: Interactive discussion on how to get to that place of bliss and joy by living from the heart. With Carol Foldvary-Anderson / varyCarol

description: Learn more about your fellow burners in this lively, interactive game. Players assemble as a group and field questions related to “Cargo Cult,” materialism, worship, and other topics. Rather than speaking, each player indicates their answer by moving to one side of the space or the other. See for yourself who agrees with you and who doesn’t. It’s a discussion in which everyone participates all the time (not just the loudmouths). Come with friends to share this bonding experience, or come on your own and make new friends at Camp Baggage Check!
title: Foot Poll at Baggage Check
print_description: Learn more about fellow burners in this lively, interactive game. Answer questions through movement to see what unites & divides us as people.

description: For women. Become all that you are. Become all that you wish to be. Become all that you dare to be. What can you discover about yourself? What would you like to heal, explore, celebrate? A sensual tantric massage process with David Magichands, HBGB healer. Orientations daily. Together we create a sacred space to explore within boundaries you set, and create opportunities for healing, celebration and transformation. For more info join the Basic Bodywork and Ecstatic Touch workshop David leads early each afternoon in the HeebeeGeebee chill space, or in the classroom, see schedule for Joyful Practical Tantra class. Ask for a mini-process orientation following the workshop, or make an appointment at the HBGB reception table. Feel free to begin some of the processes early by checking in with David at BlueMorphoCenterNews.com where there are more descriptions of the course and processes or by emailing direct to davidmagichands at yahoo.com
title: Freeing The Goddess Within
print_description: For women. Become all that you dare to be. What would you like to heal, explore, celebrate? A sensual tantric massage process with David Magichands

description:
For 15 years I have been photographing and giving prints to the participants of Burning Man.  Each person is photographed in a professional studio and given a print as my gift.  You are photographed in all your BM splendor by a professional photographer using medium format black and white film. ALL are welcome. Bring your friends/family and anyone you may find for this unique experience of being seriously photographed.
Each morning we serve individually brewed coffee and in the evening host a beer bar as well as offering CMT massage during the day.
title: Free Photography Zone
print_description: Join us for the best photographs of yourselves ever on the Playa.  15 years of giving prints to participants. Everyone gets a photograph to take home.

description: Where is dust frum? Don’t know? Ask a Ranger. They look awfully suspicious (if you ask us) like a veritable cargo cult of dust. It’s a fool’s errand to get the dust off them, but we try every year anyway. You too can be one of the sexiest clean freaks on the playa. Rendezvous with us! Please bring: non-feather dusters, rags, dustbusters, service carts, vacuums, white gloves, latex gloves, enema kits, lube, any other useful cleaning equipment, and your worst possible French accent. On Thursday at 2:00 pm we meet at 3 O’Clock and Esplanade then dust our way through every filthy, nasty camp on our march toward that dust bucket known as Center Camp Café, liberate them from their dusty oppression, and celebrate our triumph!
title: French Maid Brigade Parade
print_description: Where is dust frum? We’re not sure, but help us get rid of it. Join us in uniform with your non-feather duster and your worst possible French accent.

description:

Bring a plate and your appetite!

description:
Party with us Furry style. Wear your ears, tails, whiskers, and come on over and dance and have a drink with us. 

Ya, that's right.  We like dressing up as animals.  So do you.  Sometimes we like to act like animals (respectfully).  And so do you.

We've got some of our favorite dance dj's providing the tunes.  We've got a bar for you to get your drink on at.  What more can you want, others dressed up as animals?  You can count on that!

So come on over to Fur, and hang out and socialize with others.  Bunnies, Unicorns, Kitties, Pups, Monkeys, the list goes on.  All species, all party animals welcome!
title: Frolic in the Desert
print_description: Party with us Furry style. Wear your ears, tails, whiskers, and come on over and dance and have a drink with us. All party animals welcome!

description: "Creative thinking is the process of generating new and useful ideas in any domain e.g., in the arts, in business, at home, in science etc. It is a cognitive skill which involves stimulating the brain to make new associations and connections in order to create an original thought – this is how creative ideas are made!Creativity is the ability to see what everyone else sees, but see and think what nobody else is seeing or thinking!Our Creative Thinking training course is designed to teach you the processes of creative thinking using a tool-kit of practical creativity techniques. It is a highly practical course which focuses on teaching you how to be more creative in your everyday environment. This means that you will be able to brainstorm new ideas on demand whether you are working on your own or in groups."
title: From Potential to Performance

description:
Come get your FUNK on all night long! We'll be boogieing to the funkiest tunes on the playa! We've spent the last year searching the depths of all the universe to bring you only the deepest, badest, funkiest, get down music ever created. 

We'll be providing social boogie lubrication to keep both your insides and outsides warm. (Irish Coffee & Hot/Cold Toddies) If the Funk & Drinks are not enough to keep you cookin' you can always warm your bones by our Fire of Funk.

Have a funk request? We're always looking grow our library of funk. Shoot us an email and let us know what kind of funk you jam too.

See you at funk camp!

(be sure to check out our good intention book exchange and tea service as well)

description: Are you just wild about Hairy? Does a furry man bring out the beast in you? Tonight, furry adult Gay, Bi & Curious men of the Playa and the 18+ men into them let their hair down to gather for hot man-to-man action @ 7:15 GDP in Down Low Club’s discreet, enclosed, air-cooled manplay tent. Open 24/7 all week, it'll be packed tonight with adult men ranging from smooth to Sasquatch. Missed the whole chia pet craze? description: Black Rock City's LGBTQQ community kicks off the week in festive rainbow colors with libations, music and an exchange of info on the week's gay-oriented events. This premier annual opening-night gathering for the Playa's Gay/Bi/Curious Burners and their friends is hosted by Down Low Club Camp in memory of Mario Cisneros, founder of the event. Come meet new friends, reaquaint with those from past Burns, perhaps spark a new Playa romance or rekindle one from the past. Gather with your LGBTQQ brothers and sisters to learn where they are camped and what events they've got planned for the week on the Playa. Don't forget to bring a flyer or other info about your gay-oriented events to post on our LGBT Community Bulletin Board.
title: Gay Meet & Greet

description:
We have about a gross of very cool goggles. All of them are either missing rivets that attach the wings or wires or are missing 1 rivet out if the 4 that are the nose strap. These can be fixed with glue guns. Come, we will help you fix them up, make them look even more awesome, and then they're yours!

Bring anything to class that you think will make your goggles look cooler (and non-moopy), like fake flowers, spandex, and headbands. Also, while we will have some tools on hand, don't be shy about bringing your own.

Also, try to email me in advance if you want to join so that we can plan ahead, but it's also probably ok if you just show up.

print_description: Refurbish busted goggles into top of the line eyewear. Look amazing, maybe see amazing.

description:
Those pesky kids are always on your lawn! Your kids are stealing your pension money! No one understands how it was in the olden days! It's time to show everyone who's in charge! We're going to march through Burning Man and stand up for senior's rights (while stopping at the neighbourhood pubs for some refreshments). 

We'll slowly move through the city at our own leisurely pace. Why? Because we're seniors!

description:
Holotropic Breathwork™ is a powerful approach to self-exploration and healing that integrates insights from modern consciousness research, anthropology, various depth psychologies, transpersonal psychology,
Eastern spiritual practices, and mystical traditions of the world. The
name Holotropic means literally "moving toward wholeness" (from the
Greek "holos"=whole and "trepein"=moving in the direction of something).

The process itself uses very simple means: it combines accelerated
breathing with evocative music in a special set and setting. With the
eyes closed and lying on a mat, each person uses their own breath and
the music in the room to enter a non-ordinary state of consciousness.
This state activates the natural inner healing process of the
individual's psyche, bringing him or her a particular set of internal experiences. With the inner healing intelligence guiding the process,
the quality and content brought forth is unique to each person and for
that particular time and place. While recurring themes are common, no
two sessions are ever alike.
title: Holotropic Breathwork Workshop with Sheelo Bohm
print_description: Holotropic Breathwork is an approach to self-exploration and healing that integrates insights from psychology and a variety of mystic traditons.

description:
Young food activists are sparking a renaissance of a 150 year old order - The Grange.  A national organization having its roots in family farms and community halls. 

Many Granges have become home to food literacy and sovereignty activists and the slow foods movement.

While the Grange has its roots in a fraternal organization from the start it supported woman having an equal voice and vote.

The California State Grange is a leader in the Grange revitalization and was an early advocate of GMO labeling. 

California Prop 37 was initiated by a Granger.  California is one of many Granges throughout the country that are supporting a return of agriculture to local farming, organics, sustainable practices, alternative energy and localization of living and working.  We actively support the arts, music, education, youth and engage in a variety of community service projects.

California Grange is on the forefront of revitalizing this organization that was founded after the Civil War by family farmers who opposed domination by big banks and railroads that controlled markets and prices. 

Corporatocracy is ever more powerful and many Granges actively oppose it.

Come learn about the Grange and how we work to create relevant communities whether urban or rural rooted in family and friendship.
title: Home on the Grange
print_description: Discover the Grange a grass root org started by populist farm radicals who fought big banks & railroads. We grow relevant & resilient communities.

description:
Did you ever wonder why you feel a nagging emptiness, even though you meditate every day? Think you may be missing something, or maybe .. hitting something that isn't there? Wonder why everything is harder now that you've started to meditate?

You're probably NOT meditating! Or at least, you're not being told what is NOT meditation! For centuries, techniques that have been used successfully on eastern type folks seem to be falling flat in The West, and there are some questions you may not have asked, or had answered. Join Zyg, a veteran of Not Meditating, for a talk and workshop on How Not to Meditate. Mediation cannot be discussed, but only experienced.. Zyg hopes to steer you into an authentic understanding of Meditation, and of sitting, standing, or whatever else you may be doing that is not meditation. Especially Meditation.
title: How NOT to Meditate!
print_description: Can you feel there is a more authentic experience that lies beyond Meditation? Join Zyg for a workshop on How Not To Meditate!

description: Eden Alchemy presents: Initiation into the secrets of mystical inner polarization that leads to the state of ONENESS. We will explore how the perfect balance between the polar opposites of the Soul creates the ineffable 0-point, the Third Element, the non-dual perception of reality, which is experienced as being GOD.  We will together invoke the Divine Feminine in Her profoundly deep, naked, authentic, healing, initiatic role in order to give birth to our cosmic, true nature.  We have been fascinated and passionately exploring the Art of the Sacred Union for years, studying the tantric teachings of Kashmir Saivism tradition, Kaula lineage, Dasha Mahavidya system, Sufi mysticism, sexual shamanism, and occidental esoteric alchemy and psychology.  Beloved seekers of truth, you are heartfully welcome to share the Magic. With Lolia Shakti and Liliyan Ananda.
title: Inner Alchemy of UNIO MYSTICA
print_description: Initiation into the secrets of mystical inner polarization that leads to the state of ONENESS. With Lolia Shakti and Liliyan Ananda (Eden Alchemy)

description:
This is a presentation that narrates a personal healing process through the use of entheogenic agents. These agents provided the transcendent space that allowed inner wounds to be reconfigured into a more manageable and workable form, releasing the soul from inner/outer conflict.

Experiences with three different entheogenic agents enabled me to access states of consciousness that fostered healing in my familial relationships by re-framing conflicts, through form of visions and wider understandings, in pictorial, mythological, and transcendent narratives. These experiences in the Other Worlds have been translated into substantial and concrete shifts in the Ordinary World.

This journey through the ‘immaterial' considers entheogenic agents as psychological/emotional catalysts for transformation and growth. The Jungian framework of alchemy and individuation has been central in filtering my transformational process and the focus is on its relevance to integrating psychedelic explorations.
title: In Search of the Philosopher's Stone
print_description: This presentation narrates a personal healing process through the use of entheogenic agents.

description:
Sacred Dance
Blossoming through all lies sacredness, the true feminine principle of quiet thunder. Experience the movements & awaken the power within.
Blossoming through all yet imperceptible to many lies sacredness, the true feminine principle of quiet thunder.  Long forgotten but recently rediscovered behind a fake wall in the White Cloud Monastery in China, 24 drawings of the Jade Maiden guide us back to the feminine practice of Qigong and our feminine essence.  Each one of us must balance and unite the male & female powers within, and  restore balance to the world. Come experience the movements of this Sacred Dance, deciphered from these drawings,  & awaken the feminine power within using this ancient wisdom.  All are welcome.
title: Jade Maiden Qigong
print_description: Blossoming through all lies sacredness, the true feminine principle of quiet thunder. Experience the movements & awaken the power within Jade Maiden.

Come enjoy or participate in our nightly live jazz jam sessions. Warm up to the sweet sounds of live jazz, our signature irish coffee, and our burn barrel.

The Playa Jazz Cafe (or is it a club?) is a musical sanctuary for the weary playa traveler lost in a sea of electronica. Musicians are encouraged to bring their instruments and help spread the magic of jazz! Note that the session will begin after the man burns on Saturday night.

With an easy whirling dance and a silly attitude, we'll flash mob different venues, surprising people with no-sting jellys.

description:
Presenting the Culmination of
a Dazzling Romance Unlike Any Other

Jenjen Wong & Noah Zilberberg
Friday, August 30, 2013
6pm @ The Trash Fence
Burning Man Festival
Black Rock City, Nevada

Join us to witness and celebrate our union at 6pm "The Golden Hour” of the day at the legendary “Trash Fence” about 100yds to the right of Point 3 (straight out from the man/temple line and a little to the right).

Come by foot, bike or art car! Those seeking a ride via Love Potion/Amphora Art Car have the option of meeting at Camp Manifestation (9:35&E) at 5:00pm-5:15pm.

You are invited to wear your playa best and join us for a champagne toast after the ceremony.

A Side Note: If you have never been to the trash fence you may think we are crazy to have such a special ceremony at such a strange place. Well we are crazy but you will soon understand why the trash fence sounds like rubbish to some and magic to others…

Why Burning Man? Crazy right!?
Why yes we are! And since BM is where we met, it seemed the most perfect place for us to get married. There is NO obligation to attend. If you can join us, we'd love to have you! We are so happy to have a wedding without seating arrangements so the MORE the MERRIER!
title: Jenjen & Noah's Wedding - Fri, Aug 30 - 6pm
print_description:
Presenting the Culmination of
a Dazzling Romance Unlike Any Other

Jenjen & Noah
Fri, Aug 30, 2013
6pm @The Trash Fence
100yds to right of pt 3

description: Lisa Schroeder of the Children of Chaos will be hosting her Jewish Mother booth again this year, dispensing advice and nurturing for all.  “The Jewish Mother You Never Had” will be available daily and Mom's hours will be posted in front of the camp.   Mama Lisa will be providing cookies, milk, (maybe even a bagel!) and lots of love and caring for Burners requiring a little TLC - in English, Hebrew, Yiddish, French, and/or Spanish.   The 2009 version of this event won the Acculturation Video award from Burning Man (http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=dtX8Z-izffs\).  As Mama Lisa says, "everyone needs motherly advice, but who wants to hear if from their own mother?...oy, too much baggage!"  Come visit with Burning Man's very own Jewish Mother who dispenses love, nurturing, advice and no guilt (unless absolutely necessary).
title: Jewish Motherly Advice

description: Kama Flight Massage blends the dynamism of contact improv, the serene flow of Watsu, the deep release of Thai massage and the exhilaration of aerial yoga.  It comprises a new somatic modality for reanimating the body with its improvisatory flow and playful exploratory freedom. Supported on a massage table with your body borne aloft on the continually moving fulcrum of the practitioner’s body, the receiver is moved through a wide range of extended postures.  Using a suite of practiced movements, such as pivoting his body under different joints of your body, the giver is able to move the receiver seamlessly and weightlessly throughout the course a session. He safely levers the receiver’s body into increasingly extended and pleasurable positions that combine deep hip opening, pivoting and spinal decompression that, collectively, evoke a deep state of surrender.
title: Kama Flight Massage with Roland Peralta
print_description: It blends the dynamism of contact improv, the serene flow of Watsu, the deep release of Thai massage & the exhilaration of aerial yoga.

description:
We'll have two classes explaining and demonstrating on how to throw a knife. Part of the explaining will be on why this is NOT a martial art and why, despite everything you've seen in the movies, no one in their right mind would ever throw a knife at a person. It should be thought of as more of a form of object manipulation, like juggling.
  We'll have one wall for throwing at and a floor board for familiarizing yourself with the weight and balance of the knives. Between classes when we're at our teepee and not wandering around experiencing the wonders of Burning Man we'll be available for more knife throwing fun. Classes will be Tuesday and Thursday 10:00 - 12:00
title: Knife Throwing
print_description: Knife Throwing class & practice. We'll have two classes explaining and demonstrating how to throw. Other times we'll just throw. Look for the teepee

description:
Standing on a 8’ tall altar, the 6-armed idol reaches 30' into the air to spew fireballs from flame-cannons mounted at the end of each arm, beseeching the Deep-Voiced Spirits in the Sky to bring cosmic cargo to the dusty city.
As the desert burners gather at the feet of the idol, they cogitate into a prayer-trance, beaming waves of mental energy, focusing and preparing for the bearers of cosmic cargo. Using brainwave-oracles to channel mental energy, the supplicants invoke the Tesla-Jinn and energize the cargo ritual, producing a fiery prayer-ring-of-hands, circling overhead faster and faster, and as the coil begins to energize a hoary crown of high voltage discharge develops a dome of plasma, arcing and sparking wildly, as the electromagnetic prayer is transmitted out into the heavens, and as the transubstantiation is at zenith the distant sound of approaching Voices can be heard, building in volume as a host of heavily-laden, ground-shaking, cargo-bearing bird machines bears down on the encampment, growing louder and louder until the thunderous, throbbing drone of a chorus of engines shakes the tower and brings an eruption of devotional energy as precious cosmic cargo rains down upon the blessed worshipers of dust and fire. Weather permitting.

We invite you to strap on a brainwave "oracle" and watch the monitor as you control your brainwaves and fire the flame cannons, invoking the "Cosic Cargo Routine".

Brain cleansing services may be available throughout the day but we cannot commit to being properly staffed except on the posted time and date. We expect to be operational each night around dusk at the Hookah Lounge, providing at least one of the operating crew still survives and is able to awake the Jinn.
title: KognitoKlast
print_description: Use our brainwave analyzer to fine tune your powers of supplication and increase your cargo. Each night around dusk at the Hookah Lounge @ 4:20 and A

description:
Start your evenings (5PM: M, Tu, W, F) or days (10AM: Th, Sa) with the most intense laughter you can experience.  
We laugh for no reason, other than for exercise, and health. Relieve  
stress and pain, promote natural healing, and create spontaneous bonds  
of friendship through group laughter. It’s fun! The brainchild of Dr.  
Madan Kataria in India and practiced by millions worldwide, Laughter  
Yoga combines Unconditional Laughter with Yogic Breathing (Pranayama).  
Anyone can Laugh for No Reason, without relying on humor, jokes or  
comedy. Laughter is simulated as a body exercise in a group; with eye  
contact and childlike playfulness, it soon turns into real and  
contagious laughter. The concept of Laughter Yoga is based on a  
scientific fact that the body cannot differentiate between fake and  
real laughter. One gets the same physiological and psychological  
benefits. Find much more info online by searching on Laughter Yoga,  
but come! Enjoy!
title: Laughter Yoga
print_description: Laughter as exercise! Laugh with others in childlike playfulness and experience all the health benefits of a good, long laugh!

Create a new career?
Dismantle your excuses?
Be happy?
Take down your dark side?
Start dreaming again?
Stop limiting what's possible for yourself?
And LOVE your whole LIFE?

Guess what is standing in your way? YOU! 
And we're here to fix that. Like a chiropractor who adjusts your body, we adjust your life emotionally, mentally and spiritually, helping you see what's holding you back and giving you the tools to create the life you want.

Camp IMAGINEnation is a life coaching camp dedicated to the power of dreaming and radical honesty. Our Life Coaches are trained in The Handel Method and go through an extensive 2-year or more training process on life issues and human behavior. 

Camp IMAGINEnation was founded by The Handel Group and born of an authentic and ambitious desire to change the world in a very positive way. It is a spiritual endeavor for us. We think that those who are willing to dig deep and look at themselves honestly are the most courageous people in the world, not to mention, people we’d want to hang with. In a word, we are looking to make personal development cool. We think it is. 

The Handel Method was developed over the last 15 years by HG Co-founder and Chairman, Lauren Zander. The method is the foundation for not only our life coaching work, but also for the courses we teach at MIT, NYU, Rutgers and Stanford Business Schools, and for the work we do within large companies in the Executive Coaching Division. The method is revolutionary yet easy to understand, methodical yet infinitely customizable. Most importantly of all, it has proven to be highly effective.

Together we dig deep, play big and don’t stop until goals are fulfilled and lessons learned. We care, we love what we do and we walk our talk.
title: Life Coaching
print_description:
Life Coaching 
False Idol & 6:30
Mon-Sat 12-4
A life coaching camp dedicated to the power of dreaming and radical honesty.

description:
What is the meaning of life in 5 words? If you’re lucky enough to find the Tree of Life reaching for the sky, you realize you had the answer all along.  
The "Life in 5 Words" project began in the desert of Black Rock City, at Burning Man 2010. 
A small wooden desk is built on the side of the road. It is guarded by the Tree of Life, a "palm" tree with leafy hands outstretched to the sky.  Inside there is the blank Book of Life. Anyone who opens this mysterious book is greeted with the question “What is the meaning of life?” The Catch: your answer has to be in 5 words, no more no less. 
Answers will be written within the book’s dusty pages throughout the week of Burning Man. Ravers, demons, and dusty pilgrims will stop to reflect and contribute their answers. It is a shared experience; anyone and everyone has access to the book.
title: Life in 5 Words
print_description: What is the meaning of life in 5 words? If you’re lucky enough to find the Tree of Life reaching for the sky, you realize you had the answer all along

description:
Interested in learning how secure locks really are?  Enjoy playing with small mechanical puzzles?  Want to see if you can, one day, become a true ninja?  Then come by and participate in our Introduction to Lockpicking Workshop.

I'll start the session off with a presentation on the guts of standard pin tumbler locks (the kind of key-locks you'll find on most front doors and many padlocks) and how this translates into lock vulnerabilities and inevitably the potential for picking.  The presentation will be repeated as needed throughout the workshop.  I'll supply sets of practice locks with escalating difficulty and plenty of tools to go around.  The rest of the workshop will go to open play-time and questions.  Just bring yourself and an open mind!  I'll even bring a few challenge locks for the quick-learners, masochists, and already-experienced pickers.

Come and learn how to open today's most commonly used lock - without the key.
title: Lockpicking Workshop
print_description: A presentation for the complete beginner to be repeated.  Tools, locks, and play-time supplied.  Just bring yourself and an open mind!

description:
The sun’s just up, but not too hot yet, but clothing is optional here,  so adults only, please. Come for an early hour of low impact exercise  in the Longevity Stick Art (LSA) discipline of 12 low-impact exercises  
to build balance, flexibility, strength, mental focus, breathing capacity, and vitality, and open your points and channels. Bring your water or hydration liquid. We’ll have sticks available for you. Master Mai Bac Dao developed the Longevity Stick Art discipline while he was a prisoner of war of the North Vietnamese Army. He helped his fellow  prisoners restore and maintain their health through LSA, and vowed that if he was ever freed, he would dedicate his life to spreading its benefits to the world, with the proviso that no future trainer could ever charge for the course. (Sounds like "gifting," eh?) He was freed, settled in Southern California, and started teaching classes of students and future teachers. Today, there are dozens of classes weekly around So Cal. Also, LSA is spreading around the US and world.  
Many more details are available at:  HYPERLINK 
"http://www.longevitystick.org/Longevitystick.org/Home.html " www.longevitystick.org/Longevitystick.org/Home.html and  HYPERLINK "http://www.filmbaby.com/films/2341 "  
Master Dao passed away late 2010 at age 89, and I was privileged to attend his funeral, and his last birthday party, a few months before.
title: Longevity Stick Art
print_description: Sun’s up, but not too hot. Clothes optional. Lo impact exercise for balance and open points & channels. Bring H2O. We got sticks for you. Adults only.

description:

description: Intellectual exchange on the playa in a participatory speaker series in BRC. Talks will range from 15- 30 with a following Q&A. description:
Connecting Through Your Roots. Through breathing, cleansing and guided meditation, establish your divine connection with Mother Earth. Gravity central.Grounding is a vital component of daily balanced living. It allows us to deepen our connection with mother earth, or Gaia, and source energy. It teaches us how to release stress, stay focused, clear the chatter from our minds and auric fields, and eliminate free radicals from our bodies. When we connect with Gaia, we begin to realize that we are all safe and well provided for. We learn to understand our greater truths and to let go of fear, anger, guilt and anxiety. This allows us to establish a connection with our divine authentic self.

Whether you are a seasoned meditator or novice, you are invited to experience an ancient Eastern meditation breathing technique that has been passed on from master to master for centuries to achieve self-enlightenment. In this workshop you will learn about the chakra system, with an emphasis on the root, sacral and solar plexus. Our chakras govern our life force energy as well as our glandular, mental and emotional systems. Through the use of sage, crystals and sound we will also start to understand basic cleansing of our auric field and our surroundings. We will utulize ancient grounding techniques and a guided meditation to establish our connection with Gaia, help transform our outlook, and feel more grounded in our everyday lives.
title: Me and Mother Earth
print_description: Connect Through Your Roots. Through breathing, cleansing and guided meditation, establish your divine connection with Mother Earth. Gravity central.

description: Medicine Dance is a somatic, ecstatic and shamanic dance ceremony supporting the emergence of living Oneness and what it truly means to be embodied and aware in all of our Humanness. It is fun & empowering. Anyone can do it. Using movement, we work with the 5 elements of Earth, Water, Fire, Air and Ether to access the unique Medicine that is encoded within each of us and create a deeper relationship to our Selves, Others, and LIFE. By having an experiential understanding of how these elements work, we gain tools that help us to move through life in a more centered & conscious manner, embracing the shifting currents as exactly the Medicine we need for our healing & growth. We come together peacefully to create a deep space of exploration, safety, shared practice, transformation and community.
title: Medicine Dance with Suzana Marjanovic
print_description:
A somatic, ecstatic & shamanic dance ceremony supporting the emergence
of living Oneness, liberation & embodied awakening through movement.

description:
Medicine Dance is a somatic, ecstatic and shamanic dance ceremony that supports the emergence of liberation, interconnectivity and embodied awareness as we move through the fullness of our human experiences. It's fun, empowering and accessible to people - all that is required is curiosity & a willingness to explore one's inner terrain through movement.
Using movement, we work with the 5 elements of Earth, Water, Fire, Air and Ether as allies to access the unique Medicine that is encoded within each of us and create a deeper relationship to our Selves, Others, and LIFE. By having an experiential understanding of how these elements work, we gain tools that help us to move through life in a more centered & conscious manner, embracing the shifting currents as exactly the Medicine we need for our healing, growth and expansion into the fullness of our lives. We come together peacefully to create a deep space of exploration, safety, shared practice, transformation and community.
title: Medicine Dance w/Susan Marjanović
print_description: A somatic, ecstatic & shamanic dance ceremony supporting the emergence of living Oneness, liberation & embodied awakening through movement.

description:
We all remember men sporting kilts, tutus and sarong and wearing the hell out of them in Black Rock City. And let's not forget the Mad Menesque fashion theme of Cargo Cult for this year and challenge the fashion toward Metrosexual to pull out the needle and thread and make it hot!

This show is for the exhibitionist male who wants to strut the catwalk in front of an appreciative audience of admirers:
- No Modeling experience necessary
- This is a pansexual, all gender-identity event! It is the celebration of the masculine/feminine essence we enjoy so much!
- Hair or Make Up will be available prior to the show for participants who show up early enough
- A sense of rhythm helps but simply moving works just fine

Come early and stay late for the Men's Lingerie Review in the Dungeon. Same models, sans outerwear. Models, bring your lace thongs, your hosiery, corsets and the pieces that make you feel sexy all under!

During the shows, Retrofolic will offer delicious alcohol and non-alcohol beverages. Lights of color, art of goth and kink will treat your eyes. Music of tribal and trance, multiple scenes with howls of delight, moans of agony and screams of extremes will fill your ears in the 1600 feet squared dungeon space next door!
title: Men in Skirts Fashion Show
print_description: This show is for the exhibitionist masculine-type who wants to strut the catwalk in front of an appreciative audience of admirers.  Dress to express!

description: Our goal for this "Miso soup camp" is to prevent electrolyte imbalance for Burners. According to wikipedia, Pure miso paste nutritional information: Although high in sodium (over 400% DV), one cup (275 g) of miso paste is an excellent source of dietary fiber (59%) and protein (64% DV), as well as a good source of minerals . Miso paste is also high in amino acids, the basic building blocks of protein. An excellent source of vitamin K and a decent source of riboflavin (38% DV), miso also provides small amounts of other vitamins. One major benefit of miso is its extremely high omega-3 and omega-6 fatty acid content. We believe Miso saves Burners life on the Playa and leave them with good health all day.
title: Miso Soup
print_description:
We serve Miso Soup in the morning.
Stimulate yourself with Miso Soup after "Hard Night" on the Playa.
(Please bring your own cup and spoon)

description:
Walk the line between science and shamanism with volcanologist and spiritual seeker Allison Austin, whose groundbreaking new research proves that our planet has a consciousness and is speaking to us through volcanoes. 

There is an ancient code about the energetic nature of the Earth preserved in volcano mythology, which defines a global grid of sacred geometry whose symbolism reflects the legends themselves. These new maps of our planet connect pyramids, stone circles, mysterious sites, powerful cities, and geologic wonders around the world, giving us a deeper understanding of the forces that control our geography, politics, culture, collective consciousness, and even our cosmic lifelines. 

Explore a vision of a living planet once shared by our ancestors, long forgotten in our masculine-dominated, linear-thought world. Our Earth is alive! What she has to say will change you forever...
title: Molten Roots

description: Leave No Trace includes more than trash. Things like feathers, sequins, and pom-pons can easily become detached and blow away in the wind. Learn creative alternatives for embellishing your outfits.  Why expose your $300 boots to the harsh environment of BRC? Save your money and learn how to outfit yourself using upcycled materials. Playa-wear designer Judes (Judi Morales Gibson) will share tips and resources on how to re-work used clothing, household linens and found objects into economical, original and eco-friendly playa clothing. It’s not easy being fabulous, but it’s worth the effort.
title: MOOP-Free Fashion
print_description: Poorly planned playa-wear can result in micro-moop. Learn creative alternative embellishments and upcycling for fabulous playa clothing from Judes!

description:
Mutt & Jeff's brings you live music, refreshing beverages and a safe haven from the front lines. Prepared in the same color palette as your intercepted broadcasts, you should feel quite comfortable until you are called back to action.

::::Message from Space Invader::::I hail from afar, but have intercepted your signals.  I have made it my mission to give you security, safety, entertainment, and refreshment in place of your mayhem.  I know your planet is a troubled place, but I also have learned that you enjoy a colorless existence and live piano.  Hopefully these will ease your hardship and please your soul.  Come drop by for a visit with me and my minions before heading back to your plight. I leave you with this poem:

5-star Generals//
Privates 1st class//
Show equal rank//
In the drinking-glass.
title: Mutt and Jeff's Piano Bar
print_description:
5-star Generals//
Privates 1st class//
Show equal rank//
In the drinking-glass.

description:
This is our 10th year!  

Each year since 2004, hundreds of naked burners meet at the Man to consume a little liquid courage, and pedal off into the City for a few hours of bar hopping.  Multiple host camps will have bartenders standing by with icy libations prepared exclusively for the ride participants.  We’ll be stopping off at Barbie Death Camp & Wine Bistro, Celestial Bodies, Duck Pond, and more.  If you make it to the end of the ride, the after party at Comfort & Joy will be hosted once again by a team of talented bartenders wearing nothing but their hospitality.  

This isn’t an event, it’s a tradition.  So if you’re willing to meet the dress code, join us for one of the goofiest parties on the playa.  Mugs for the first 400 riders (and yeah, we always run out).

Cheers!
title: Naked Pub Crawl
print_description: 10th Year! Host camps serve up icy cocktails. It's like Critical Mass, but with alcohol and blatant public nudity. Mugs for the first 400 riders.

description: At this workshop psychotherapist Meriana Dinkova will introduce some important factors to consider when navigating altered states of consciousness. She will share some useful tools that can maximize our experience, as well as what we can learn, in those inner voyages. Non- ordinary states of consciousness can come with their own sets of 'superpowers', operating principles and potential pitfalls. Knowing how to use those forces for expansion, and alignment, can not only occasionally save you from 'the inner gates of hell', but also bring accelerated growth, ecstatic experiences, and a deep feeling of connectedness with yourself, others, and the world. Through lecture, sharing, and experiential exercises she will enrich your psychonaut- toolkit, and activate and empower your inner shaman.
title: Navigating Altered States - Meriana Dinkova

description:
(Nothing but) Flowers

You've travelled to the ends of the Earth, cast aside your default life, and willingly peered over the Edge. Now what?

(Nothing but) Flowers is a seminar devoted to the propagation of Burning Man core principles in the default world. In keeping with this years theme of the "Cargo Cult" we will discuss situations in which small populations of subjugated people have maintained their beliefs in the face of hegemonic reprogramming efforts. As such, we will discuss the role of the individual in changing the default world to reflect the best of what the Burn represents via various methods of culture jamming and activism.

(Nothing but) Flowers a Talking Heads song, and meme for this discussion can be heard immediately following this event @DC not Washington Talking Heads dance party!
title: (Nothing but) Flowers
print_description: You've travelled to the ends of the Earth, cast aside your default life, and willingly peered over the Edge. Now what?..Culture jamming default world

description:
On the inner playa side of the road, the CEO will give a rundown of things so far, and then will field report outs from all reps, please come prepared.  We will look at the numbers, and marketing will give a presentation, unveiling their new "hippie metric."  Accounting will show how beans really do matter, and sales will fart out some new predictions in sports related language.  Engineering will explain that the release schedule has been pushed back and the new features that caused this scope creep really are worth it. 

We will then engage in team building exercises to create a unity or bond, not unlike super glue.  Business development will explain the concept behind switching our focus from focusing to porn, spoiler alert: they are way ahead and will blow you away with their research.

We will serve coffee and bagels pictographically (due to budget cutbacks).  Please bring trousers for the pants cannon segment, legal when update us on the shirt cocking issue.

description:
For the curious to experienced to come and play in our well equipped, safe and supervised dungeon. We have separate play areas with 3 being semi private. We offer a St. Andrews Cross, a seated cross, 2 benches, 2 saw horses, an 8 foot chain spider web, a prayer bench, a suspension hook up, a spanking/massage bench, petting zoo, cage and lots of toys (floggers, paddles, feathers, pinwheels, violet wand, and more). We provide instruction, safe and supervised play areas, and can assist with facilitating your experience. All equipment are available for you to experience and play with.
We also offer daily classes on "An intro into the more sensual side of dungeon play" and "Learning the Ropes" where you can learn basic Shibari and  how to make a sexy chest harness, corset, and tortiose shell. Both classes will cover the safety aspects of dungeon play and using ropes. Everyone is welcome to stay after the classes and practiced what you've learned. 
Also, come and relax or play in our lounge area where you can take a chance with our playfull spinning wheel guaranteed to liven up your Burning Man experience and try our famous cherry bombs.
Our play area is open throughout the day and most of the night. Come by and stay a while or stop by for a quick and enjoyable spanking while on your way out to the playa.
title: Open Dungeon
print_description: For the curious to experienced to come and play in our well equipped, safe and supervised dungeon. we're open day and night.

description:
This offering will be a combination of lecture and dialogue on the topic of open (non-monogamous) relationship as a path of awakening. Open relationships, and/or polyamory, are becoming more widely known to the general public as an alternative to the default cultural model of monogamous relationships. One of the first questions that comes up for someone when they first hear about open relationship is "Why?" Why would anyone choose this model of relationship? Certainly at the beginning of someone's exploration of open relationship (and often for sometime to come), it would seem a guaranteed way to bring up ones deepest fears and insecurities. So why do it? 

We will talk about open relationships and explore answers to these questions, from an unlikely frame, that of spiritual awakening. In my opinion, not only is open relationship compatible with a deep path of spiritual awakening, it may be one of the most profound ways to catalyze and walk that path.
title: Open Relationship as a Path of Awakening
print_description: This workshop will explore how Freedom (open relationships), and Love (the deepest commitment), can come together as a path of spiritual awakening.

description: Palenque Norte is an organization devoted to creating spaces for visionary thinkers to share their ideas. Since 2003, Palenque Norte has hosted talks from leading thinkers in in the fields of medicine, technology, spirituality, design and the environmental sciences. Past speakers include Paul Stamets, Allyson and Alex Grey, Sasha and Ann Shulgin, Cory Doctorow, Dr. Bruce Damer and many more. Our goal has been to capture the wisdom of these luminaries to preserve and share their tales throughout cyberspace.
title: Palenque Norte Speaker Series
print_description: The Palenque Norte Speaker Series will host visionary discussion with over 40 talks by visionaries, artists, healers and scientists.

description: Dr. Kirby Surprise Psy.D.(Sync) will outline the current understanding of the computational model of the mind, and the neuro psychology of how our mind/ brain system processes our experiences.  The effects of psychedelics on that processing, and their potential use as personal tools for integration, and what has been discovered from research, will be presented.  The lecture will partially answer questions concerning the effects of hallucinogens of brain function, the relationship between brain activity and consciousness, and how focused intent and the use of hallucinogens affect the way the brain processes and integrated experience.
title: Personal integration and effects of psychedelics
print_description: The computational model of the mind and the effects of psychedelics. - With Kirby Surprise Psy.D.

description: The Photon Salon is a tent that hosts several interactive light-based art installations, including the latest evolution of the popular Space Palette instrument.  Sun-blocking fabric allows the installations to be enjoyed inside the Salon during the day, and at night the white outside walls of the Salon are used as projection surfaces for interactive visuals.  LoopyCam is an interactive visual instrument that can record, loop, and mangle video in realtime.  Tappr.tv allows multiple people to draw and mix visuals using a variety of animated graphical wands.

print_description: Light-based interactive art (including the popular Space Palette instrument) is hosted in an enclosed tent for you to enjoy at any time, day or night.

description: Photography Through a Pinhole: Come and explore how to use a house hold item as a camera. We'll talk about how pinhole cameras work, and how their technology evolved into the digital cameras we use today. There will be cameras available to use, but you can also bring a container that doesn't let any light inside and we'll make a camera you can keep. We'll practice with some simple emulsions on the playa, but also talk about what you might use back at home to create these fun and artistic pictures.

description: What is your plastic footprint?  Take a walk through your house (or Burning Man camp) from plastic-packaged food in the kitchen to toothbrushes and shampoo in the bathroom, our world is full of plastic.  And at Burning Man, we are sleep in plastic sleeping bags in plastic tents and wear plastic goggles.  And how much of our food and water is packaged in plastic? Although some plastics make our lives better, much of it is a problem -- polluting our oceans and beaches and harming our health with toxic chemicals. But what can one person do to be part of the solution? Join us for inspiring stories and practical tips to reduce plastic in your home and on the Playa.  Author Beth Terry will share her journey from self-confessed plastic addict to empowered plastic-free activist and explain why we can't just recycle our way out of this mess.  You may even get to peek at her (nearly) plastic-free campsite.
title: Plastic-Free Burning Man Workshop
print_description: Your plastic footprint? While plastics can make our lives better, much of is a problem, join us for inspiring stories and practical tip to reduce it!

description: Looking for a participatory musical experience at Burning Man? Ever wanted to sing in a choir? Come join Madi's Playa Choir, a soulful, energized group of singers whose mission is to share the transformational experience of group singing with each other and a Sunday morning congregation. We welcome everyone, whether you have choral experience or not, we welcome drummers/percussionists and we welcome instrumentalists. We meet w,th,f,s at 10:30am-12:30pm at Camp Playatel, the largest white dome in the city. Bring your open heart, a joyful spirit and your voice to help create a moving musical experience on Sunday morning!

description:
The Last Resort Country Club and Day Disco will be hosting a tennis tournament on their tennis court. All are welcome but be prepared to demonstrate an array of skills. If you win a tennis match you may go on to the next round which could take you to a dance competition judged on racquet use and ability to hop the net. Fashion will play a large role obviously. Although this conservative tennis club will be disciplining anyone who breaks the Wimbledon all-white outfit policy, passes may be granted based on "who you know". Knowing the right people may even lead to a "no shirt, no shoes, no problem" attitude. The tennis court is regulation size, but as we move into nighttime, there could be non-standard court lighting in effect.
The Last Resort will be serving gin & tonics and other classic drinks during the entertainment. During intermissions, croquet comptetitions will be arranged on an ad-hoc basis for athletes who prefer sports that do not result in drink spillage.
title: Playa Open
print_description: A classis tennis tournament for multi-talented playa-players. The Last Resort Country Club bar will be serving gin & tonics and strawberries. Love!

description:
Transforming Learning
August 30, 2013 
10AM – 4PM with a VERY HAPPY HOUR til 5

ASPIRE VILLAGE at the keyhole: Playaskool stage, IDEATE, SingularityU and Burning Man align for a one day gathering on playa to transform our learning landscape.

GO ON A TRANSFORMATIONAL ADVENTURE - CREATE WITH NERDS & GEEKS!
Interactive Summit for the playa learning communities

Learning technology enterprises, teachers, designers, developers and reformers....bring your brilliant ideas, questions and burning insights to share with your peers from around the world.

Chief nerds on the mic include Nolan Bushnell (founder of Atari, Chuck-E-Cheese and Brainrush), Brian Behlendorf (founder of Apache and former CTO of the World Economic Forum) and leading experts in education, creativity and technology. Open space unconference curated by Evonne Heyning with support from the Burning Man Project and ASPIRE Village. Bring your own research talks, games for learning and big ideas to alter the ways we inspire each other.

Participate in Actions:
 * Choose Your Transformational Adventure (cooperative discovery & play with others)
 * Write the Manifesto for Learning (collaborative vision for future)
 * Igniting Lightning Talks (short sharing sessions on research & development)
 * Unconference Afternoon Breakout Sessions (focused group workshops and interactive salons)
 * Lunch and interactive gifting with amazing leaders

Bring your research, your games and tech, anything you want to share with nerds and geeks from around the world!
title: Playaskool & ASPIRE Village
print_description:
Burning Nerds Transformational Learning Day 
10am – 5pm
Speakers & research talks, adventures, gifts, lunch, breakout sessions, circles & happy hour

description: The bell has rung and the pandemonium has hit the playa running. Don’t get stuck holding an unpaired sock from when your washer or dryer claimed the other half. Bring them to the Playa Sock Exchange (PSE) for a half hour of crazy sock trading. However, unlike Wall Street we ask that you don’t air your dirty laundry here, please bring clean socks (a little dusty is fine, just not stinky). You may bring singles or pairs and trade up or down with fellow traders. There will be a limited supply of IPO seed sock available for you to choose from if you find you are shorted of socks on arrival.  Trade once, trade twice, trade as many times as you want.  Trading ends when the final bell rings. Everyone comes out ahead, or afoot as the case may be.
title: Playa Sock Exchange
print_description: Buy low and sell high! Bring your CLEAN paired or unpaired socks to the Thirsty Camel stage and exchange them for different socks from other burners.

description:
Calling BC/Washington/Oregon burners... Vancouver, Victoria, Bellingham, Seattle, Portland plus surrounding areas & any of our friends!
Wouldn't it be nice to be sure to catch at least ONE SUNRISE?
Wouldn't it be nice to share that with the people you know from the default world?
That's what WE THOUGHT!

An annual tradition, the last several years’ Wednesday morning PNW gatherings have been really great! An opportunity to see many people that you otherwise might not see at any other time during the week... Several people said they really appreciated the callout, as it ensured that they would catch at least ONE sunrise! And it's a sweet time to visit the Temple, mid-week, mid-progress with everyone adding their words & thoughts...

Meet you at the Temple, sunrise side, on Wednesday at 6am, & we'll watch the sun rise together.
Nice & simple, bring whatever you feel to share, or not!
Invite your friends, camp mates, associates... & we'll see you there.

Wed Sunrise at Temple of Whollyness, Black Rock City
Wed Aug 28, 6am meetup

Temple of Wholyness info:
https://www.facebook.com/templeofwhollyness

description:
Just what is Poly High Tea? - First, it's a Tea Party. We will be serving Tea and Cookies...

All you Polyamorous, poly-curious, and poly-friendly folks out there on the playa are invited to join us for a discussion about the practical issues of loving more than one in an open, responsible multi-person relationship. There are many workable forms of Polyamorous relationship - polyamory is polymorphic! There is much wisdom in the poly community which can be helpful to people trying to make *any* relationship work, monogamous or Polyamorous. There will be a facilitated discussion in which you can get your questions addressed and some of the knowledge in our community can be shared.

If you'd like to cool off and de-dust yourself after our tea party, bring a water donation to enjoy PolyParadise's famous Human Carcass Wash.

description: Where have you been?  What have you seen? What did it mean? In the tradition of Terrence McKenna, we will get together and share our past voyages and impressions of the psychedelic experience. In the psychedelic state, to quote McKenna, "One hears and beholds a language of alien meaning that is conveying alien information that cannot be Englished. Being monkeys, when we encounter a translinguistic object, a kind of cognitive dissonance is set up in our hindbrain. We try to pour language over it and it sheds it like water off a duck's back." We will push the envelope of language to see if we can go ahead and English some of that alien information after all. Perhaps art, music or dance will play a part in expressing these otherwise inexpressible concepts. All are welcome, whether experienced with the psychedelic state or not. Please note: this is a discussion group only; illegal substances and activities are not welcome in our camp. Please respect our need to keep our camp safe and 100% legal. Thank you so much.
title: Psychedelic Discussions
print_description:
Share your impressions of the psychedelic experience. Note: discussion group only; no illegal substances/activities. We  
keep our camp safe & legal.

description:
Learn how trauma can be treated effectively in one session of less than 1-1/2 hours. This is an introduction to the amazingly effective, simple and ground-breaking work of Jon Connelly in restoring victims of severe trauma, including sexual violence and war veterans, to full function. (See rapidtrauma.com for more information).

 

The morning workshop will outline the content of an average session, and explain the principles at work that allow for rapid resolution. Attendees will benefit personally by tapping into the human mind’s power to heal and restore proper function after trauma – which is defined as anything stored in the human mind in a dysfunctional way.

 

The afternoon session will ask for volunteers to do a session, free of charge, with an audience observing. Life-changing, all will gain insights that will benefit them in their life and lead to a brighter, lighter, more peaceful and exciting life.

 

Class is taught by David Monroe, who has been a “scout” of healing technologies for years, and is certified in Rapid Trauma Resolution training.
title: Rapid Trauma Resolution
print_description: Learn how trauma can be treated effectively in one session of less than 1-1/2 hours.

description:
CALLING ALL DRONES -)’(- REPORT TO THE FLIGHT DECK
The SS Tittyhawk is looking for a few good Burners!!!

On the Mornings of Tuesday Aug 27 & Thursday Aug 29, the SS Tittyhawk will be hosting deep play flight Operations in search of John Frum. He has been reported missing and he must be found.

Captain Par-K of the SS Tittyhawk invites anyone who has an RC aircraft, to come aboard and test their skills by taking off and landing on the flight deck of the SS Tittyhawk. 

If you have an RC Airplane, Helicopter, multirotor copter, RC car or truck to please join us out in Deep Playa around the 11 o’clock and the trash fence area at dawn when the winds are the calmest. 

We will be flying out over open playa so bring water too!!!!

Plan ahead and get ready. We will have power on board that can charge your rc batteries if needed. Bring out your aircraft and be one of the first to take off and land on an aircraft carrier out at Black Rock.

There will also be a special flight operation that will take the carrier closer to the man and art out on the playa for those who wish to capture video on your flights. The times and dates of this curise is listed are TOP SECERET and will be announced at the Tuesday flight gathering.

The Tittyhawk will depart the from 3 o’clock and Esplanade on these dates at first glimpse of the sun and head to the trash fence on the 11 o’clock side to preform these flight operations.

--Capt. Par-K
title: RC Flight on Aircraft Carrier

description: My mind used to constantly be living in the future.  As a perfectionist that saw problems everywhere, I would dream about what would make me happy in the future or solve my problems, but it never came by living in the future.  Learn how your mind want to escape this moment by dreaming about the future or reliving the past, but true happiness is in the now (current moment).  Through connection with my higher self and new actions and seeing that there are no mistakes, I was able to stop escaping to the future and live in the now and find joy. Class will include instructor’s story and lessons learned followed by group sharing and then a 20 minute meditation to experience the now.
title: Realizing there are no mistakes
print_description: How to live in the moment by letting go of perfectionism and perceived mistakes so you can find the life you were born to live w/ Group Participation.

description: Join us in our Lotus Dome for the daily recitation of Nam Myoho Renge Kyo and morning gongyo (the practice of chanting two chapters from the Lotus Sutra) In the Lotus Sutra Shakymuni Buddha revealed that every human being can attain enlightment in their present form. Through chanting Nam Myoho Renge Kyo an individual is able to awaken this enlightenment the Buddha revealed and reveal their own buddha nature. A practitioner of this buddhism through chanting and study can transform their life and create a state of unshakable happiness overcoming the sufferings of birth and death. Buddhism is a practice and everyone is welcome to join. Each day after chanting together we will study a buddhist concept, answer questions and share experiences about the practice and its application to our daily life. All are welcome to join us even if you have never chanted before.
title: Recitation of Lotus Sutra: Nam Myoho Renge Kyo
print_description: Chanting of Nam Myoho Renge Kyo & Lotus Sutra chapters. Join us to learn about practicing Buddhism and reveal your enlightened nature. All welcomed.

description: As we find our path along that clock we call a road,Let the winds blow you towards 2 o'clk & K,There you will find a Village,An Intergalactic Sasquatch Village,~ In this Village will stand ~ The Rootist Temple ~Where a gift you shall receive,A gift for the body, A gift for mind,It is the hope of of the teacher,that each of you share what he is offering,that we can all re-connect in this way,~ bringing you back home to your center~~ Re-connection Yoga on the Playa ~ @ The Rootist Temple ~Offered Monday thru ThursdayEveryone morning at 11amIntergalactic Sasquatch Village @ The Rootist Temple 2&k,Have you been wondering what the Rootist Temple Stands for? Have you been wondering what is Rootism? Have you been wondering what is Rootist & PHY yoga? Well then, wonder no more:The Rootist understands that the path of oneness forks many roads. There are infinite possibilities from which we may choose along the way. It’s the journey.We will learn from our experiences as we evolve as humans, and we may hopefully learn to peel away the layers of illusion fostered by maturity and our life experiences. Through study and inquiry we may also find common threads from the ancient teachings linked to modern expressions of spirituality.We may even sense unity at some point.What is beautiful about life is that there are multiple unique levels of exploration within each of us. Each layer can reveal a different angle or new areas of focus for growth evolving us to become prismatic.Our potential is driven from the main spirit channel, the heart – the keeper of our spark. Our breathing, the spiritus from which the word spirit evolved, is feeding the spark.Self-Awareness happens when we identify and tap into the roots of our beliefs with evaluation and reflection.Rootism is the belief that the truth is all around us always yet often hidden like a gem in the rough waiting for us to discover it with great enthusiasm.
title: Re-Connection Yoga ~ @ The Rootist Temple ~
print_description: Re-Connection Yoga ~ @ The Rootist Temple ~ Bringing you back home ~

description: Black Rock City is a "Pack It In, Pack It Out" city, There are no trash cans or recycling bins. You are responsible for disposing of waste properly. Do you want to reduce the amount of recycling you will have to pack out? Start by separating your your recyclables from any landfill trash. Then separate all your aluminum cans and bring them to Black Rock City Recycle Camp. We are located in Center Camp at 6:00, directly behind the Cafe. The camp is "Open" and ready to accept your cans Monday through Sunday, 9am to 5pm. Bring your clean, separated aluminum cans only. We definitely don't want your trash. We also do not accept any other recyclables, you can take them to one of the 24 hour recycling stations on your way back to Reno, check out your Survival Guide for more information. We provide a sorting area to check your cans for anything that isn't aluminum. Then you can ride the bike powered can crusher and crush your cans. After your cans get crushed, you will put your crushed cans into the large containers at the camp. All proceeds from the aluminum are donated to the Gerlach K-12 School in Gerlach, NV. Come join in the fun while doing a good thing for the planet and Black Rock City..!

description: Based on pure alchemical chi gong this powerful meditative yet extremely dynamic exercise allows anyone to access and open every single energy center of the body. Internally deconstructing and reforming the core elements that define our ancestral, emotional, and metaphysical memories the body enters a shamanic space where self healing and re-enlightenment provide regeneration. Based on traditions from the ancient Mystery School this incredibly simple set of postures blissfully transforms our minds, bodies and spirits. Our bodies are shaken, our minds quietened, our spirits blissfully energized to redefine an experience of the world around us like we never imagined possible. Sitting in a circle you are magically transported inside your body where you can access the magnetic potential that allows your new self to rediscover your dormant abilities.
title: Re-enlighten yourself - with Cristiano Cairati
print_description: Based on pure alchemical chi gong this powerful meditative yet extremely dynamic exercise allows anyone to access and open every single energy center.

description: Finding ways to remain balanced and effective in your relationships (especially within the context of non-monogamy) can be daunting, as frequent interactions can be rife with assumptions, misnomers, and "but I thought we said's". What if there was a way to mitigate the unforeseen moments that occur? Perhaps your understandings could be bolstered with a Relationship Agreement? In this workshop we'll share with you what lessons we've learned in drafting, revising, and adhering to our relationship agreement over the years. We'll also engage you in how some of these ideas might be applicable for you and your partner(s). Nobody said communication and intention in relationships was easy; we're looking to help add some texture and solidity to your foundation.
title: Relationship Agreements: Drafting & Honoring
print_description: Communication and intention in relationships isn't easy! We'll show you effective ways to keep balance, solidity, and texture in your relationship.

description:
Ashley and Bryon come together in this one hour class to transform your understanding of what it means to feel. By holding yoga poses for 3-7 minutes, we get deep into the connective tissue.  This yin practice will wake you up from those late night slumbers. The icing on the cake? Bryon, a certified structural integration therapist, osteopath and RMT, will be coming by during class to take you deeper than you have ever known... opening up old emotional and physical restrictions to help you unleash your true beautiful self on the playa. 
... or maybe you will just get a good stretch and some relief from bicycle bum! Either way, join us for some pure body bliss *

description:
Looking for a play partner?
Join the ribbon party at Retrofrolic ALL WEEK LONG!
The ribbons are an invitation to flirt, negotiate and play with each other. They show that you are seeking a play partner tonight and what kind of play you are interested in.
Wearing ribbons gives permission for others to approach you with play invitations and lets you see at a glance who might be interested in being approached by you.

If you are a DOMINANT/top, wear your ribbons on your LEFT wrist.

If you are a SUBMISSIVE/bottom, wear your ribbons on the RIGHT.

Switch? Slutty? Wear them on BOTH sides!

No one is obligated, consider this a color coded ice breaker.
This ribbon code is loosely based on the famous "hanky code", but we have made some changes (to make it easier).
title: Ribbon Party!
print_description:
Looking for a play partner?
Join the ribbon party at Retrofrolic ALL WEEK LONG!
The ribbons are an invitation to flirt, negotiate and play!

description: Most of how we experience the world is relative to the things around us - our frame of reference.  With "Ride the Wind" you lay back on an air mattress so that all you see is this VERY LARGE white fabric floating horizontally on the wind.  After a couple of minutes your mind with adopt the fabric as it's frame of reference and your body will gain the sensation of floating relative to the fabric.  Now explore the patterns the wind creates, and feel them flow through you.
title: Ride the Wind
print_description: Lay back and let your visual frame of reference drop away as this white fabric meditation experience allows you to Ride the Wind.

description:
Jamaican band Rootz Underground comes to Burning Man and Reverbia, along with Southern Oregon favorites Indubious...for a night of Reggae, I-Vibes, and Dance Riddims.  This will be the first major Jamaican band to ever perform in Black Rock City...and Burners will not want to miss out on this once in a decade show.  Rootz Underground is a large festival act who tours throughout the World and is well known in Europe and in the US.  www.rootzunderground.com   

Conscious Reggae Hip Hop Artist Wisdom with musician drummer Tomkat McCree, and DJ Solrising will also be performing at 9:30pm.  Wisdom hosted 2013 Reggae on the River and has been performing on Main Stages at festivals across the West Coast.
DJ Solrising is the former US Scratching Champion.

Also performing at 8:45pm, Buckman Coe will be performing a new solo looping set.  Buckman's band was voted 2013 Best Band in Vancouver, BC.  and Buckman has also played at many festivals across Canada and the West Coast US. 

Opening the night will be Shovelman.  The well known sound looper who plays a shovel that is stringed like a guitar.  Shovelman is a favorite on the US festival circuit and will set the tone for this great evening of talent at Reverbia's Urban Night Concerts.
title: Rootz Underground w/Wisdom, Buckman Coe
print_description: Jamaican band Rootz Underground comes to Burning Man for the first time, joined by Indubious...for an amazing night of Reggae, I-Vibes, and Dancing.

description:
You are reading this pre-playa, right?  Stop now and pack your safer sex supplies. Bring lots and lots of lube - water based lube dries fast on the playa. Pack some extra condoms, lube, dental dams, gloves, etc. to gift your friends, neighbors, and strangers. Store them out of the sunlight.

You are reading this on-playa? Good guy/gal - you know how to take care of your partner and yourself.  Look for the blue-jean colored cloth bag with Rainbow Stripe posted at participating camps and at Safer Sex Camp. The Safer Sex Kits contain condoms, lube, dental dams, gloves and trash bag.  Special safer sex and related supplies also available at Safer Sex Camp.
title: Safer Sex Kits at Safer Sex Camp
