description: Come get your latin dance on! In this dance workshop we will learn beginner level Salsa Rueda. Upon completion dancers will be able to recognize about 10 move "calls" and dance them confidently and joyously. Salsa Rueda (aka "Casino de Rueda") is a particular type of circle dancing to Salsa music. It was developed in Havana, Cuba in the late 1950s and early 1960s by the group Guaracheros de Regla. Pairs of dancers form a circle, with dance moves called out by one person, a caller. Many moves involve the swapping of partners creating a fun, synchronized, playful community circle dance.
title: Salsa Rueda Dance
print_description: Come get your latin dance on! In this workshop we will learn beginner level Cuban Salsa. Learn to groove with partners to the rhythmic tunes of Cuba!

description:
Ho ye!  Hey, Mukker!
You know who you are… maybe not Scottish by birth, but a single malt lover nonetheless.  Beautiful scotch, the more exotic and unique, the better.  If you understand – really understand – then this year at Burning Man, we may just have an event worth crossing the playa for.
Bring a bottle of your favorite drop to the Mystikal Misfits bar (4:30 & B) at 2 pm, Wednesday, August 28th.   Come armed with a strong thirst (if not an obsession) for rare single malts – the kind of bottlings that spark rave reviews and win awards.  Nothing blended, nothing commonplace.  Caress to impress with a spectacular scotch you’d like to turn the playa onto.  Once inside our exclusive event – NO BOTTLE, NO ENTRY – you will partake of Scottish music and nibbles with like-minded desert kiltsmen and women.
So while spewing feathers in the heat of the day, don’t be a numpty and end up blustered from just any bad swally and scran…  Settle into a little Misfit hospitality and savor the kind of “cargo” cults were actually started over…  You know at least one of the scotches will be spectacular, because you’re going to bring it.
And a dram good time will be had by all!

Entry requires a bottle of unique single malt scotch (no blends) , where you'll join other like-minded fans for a once-in-a-playa tasting they'll write bagpipe songs about.
title: Scotchfest 2013
print_description: Entry requires a bottle of unique single malt scotch, where you'll join other like-minded fans for a once-in-a-playa tasting they'll write songs about

description:
Get your Sexploration on! Its time to get hot and sexy with other fabulous gender queer, trans, and queer folks.

This party is a safe space for trans, gender queer, gender variant, queer, open minded, unidentified folks to get their freak on. Sexy, hot, & off the hook. We practice safer sex and in order to play you must also. This party is designed with queer folks in mind. It is specifically a safe space for gender blenders, gender benders, trans, and gender questioning folks. It also is a safe space for cis-gendered queer folks. Feel free to bring toys, condoms, gloves, lube, and cute people - of course we will also be providing. Consent in our Gender Blender dome is a must. Keep it safe, sane, and consensual. We take our consent and safety seriously, if you are not interested in fun safe play, don't show up. If you can't play safely then you can't play in our dome. If you are ready for an amazing fabulous glittery kickin play party then this is the spot for you! All levels of play are welcome from first timers to sexperts. Respect in our dome is paramount. We are creating a unique space that is not found anywhere else on playa. This party is for people of all genders with a priority on creating safety for communities that are normally marginalized or exoticized. Everyone is welcome and we especially invite our gayborhood neighbors to experience our play dome. We can't wait to see your hotness shine at this phenomenal event. 
All genders welcome all ways.

description: Shamanism, Psychedelics & Neuroscience Shamanism, Psychedelics & Neuroscience -Science is finding we are wired for spiritual awareness and transcendent vision. Our brains not only have specialized regions of spiritual perception but produce those same chemicals found in the shamanic brews and plants used for millennia. Within this framework, psychedelics are entheogens-allowing a deep, vivid experience of the inner matrix of reality. Shamanic ceremonies are designed to open these doorways. drumming rattling, mushrooms, ayahuasca, San Pedro facilitate. Patricia Savant PhD

description:
Meet your death ritual. Surrender to the inevitable but now. Release ego, social ties, stuckness.  Come back more alive than ever. Shaman initiation.
Release old stories around your personna and ego bruises.
Surrender to the inevitable but now.  die. die and come back more alive than you have been in ever so long.
we finish you off.  this could work in your favor.
 On Mon, Jun 3, 2013 at 10:38 PM, Mackenzie Elizabeth Amara ‪<mea309@nyu.edu>‬ wrote:‬
SCENARIO: AS RITUAL, WE DON’T PRE ANNOUNCE THIS.  participants enter the space and are immediately blindfolded and given earplugs to put in. we then gently lie them down in a circle, where they silently lay for a few minutes. at some point, someone begins to sprinkle dirt (earth) over them, to represent a burial. at some point, we gently have them rise (still blindfolded) and line them up, placing the hands of each person on the shoulders of the person in front of them. accompanied by drums, rattles, windchimes, flutes, etc. we walk them out to some chosen, semi-remote place on the playa. once there, we paint them with white paint (in ritual markings, not the whole body) and remove their blindfolds and ear plugs. we instruct them to embody various forms of development as we walk back to the original spot - first sliding over the earth, then crawling, then walking, and finally running. perhaps even dancing by the end. reaching our end, we break out into full celebration and incorporation, simultaneously mourning the person that has just died and celebrating the new person that has made the journey back with us.
title: Shaman's Death
print_description: Meet your death ritual. Surrender to the inevitable but now. Release ego, social ties, stuckness.  Come back more alive than ever. Shaman initiation.

description:
ZOR has traveled extensively throughout North America, the Caribbean, South Pacific and Europe studying and performing the Fire arts. By incorporating martial arts and dance he has created an exotic one man fire show that is breathtaking and immediately captivates and inspires the audience with its beauty, reverence and showmanship. He now performs for circus acts, parties, nightclubs, weddings, children's camps, team building firewalks, and city sponsored events. Recent works include opening night parties for the prestigious Cirque du Soleil, the official FireConclave performances of Burning Man, and appearances in Rolling Stone, Smithsonian and New Yorker.

Sara Huntley
Firedancing since 2007, dynamic and inspired, specializing in poi, fans, and double staffs. Currently piloting her brainchild troupe Lux Natura, Sara has been a member of Nocternal Sunshine, Kinetica, and Flux. She has graced many festivals with her performances and workshops, including Burning Man, Fractal Nation, Firedrums, and the SF Fire Arts Expo.
http://sarahuntley.weebly.com/
title: SHIFT Performance
print_description: Fire Fest with FyreGod Zor, Sara Huntley, and performers from around the world

description:
Psychoactive Pharmacology Now

Hamilton Morris, Vice, and Paul Daley, The Shulgin Institute, discuss “research chemicals” or “synthetics,” the most popular being 2C-B, and discuss the chemistry inside Ann & Sasha Shulgin's famous books, PiHKAL, and TiHKAL (“Phenethylamines [or Tryptamines] I Have Known and Loved.”)

Hamilton Morris, writer, chemist and filmmaker. He is a wizard of pharmacology, a psychedelic explorer, a maestro of all things mind-altering. Hamilton has a column in Vice, Hamilton's Pharmacopia, where he writes about rare drugs and their effects.

 Paul Daley, Ph.D, head chemist at The Shulgin Institute, co-author of The Shulgin Index.
http://www.shulginresearch.org/home/

description:
Playa Terps provides volunteer sign language interpreters (certified and pre-certified) for Deaf and Hard of Hearing Burners to bridge the communication gap on the Playa and at )'( events.  Our bulletin board is on Rod's Road between 4:30-5:30.  There you will find a list of events, instructions and the sign up sheets for Burners to request interpreting services and interpreters to pick up assignments.  

This is a volunteer group of interpreters who live all over the Playa.  There are no promises or guarantees that we can find a match for every request.  Our goal is open communication access for the interactive experience of )'( in a manner that is the culture of gifting.

For more info, please find our website at playaterps.us
title: Sign Language Interpreters
print_description: Playa Terps volunteer interpreting services for Deaf and HoH Burners.  Find our bulletin board on Rod's Road between 4:30-5:30 to request services.

description: Our project is inspired by the golden age of hand-held games. Milton Bradley debuted Simon in 1978 at Studio 54 in New York, and it remains a sweetheart of memory games and an enduring pop-culture reference to the 1980’s. We look to revive this great game in a playa-compliant fashion, offering the core gameplay intact but adding (external) flame, sound and light effects in the form of nearby sculpture. Game play will take place on an original (but deeply repurposed and reengineered) Simon hand-held console, which is synchronized with the sculpture piece (light, sound, flame). What the original game lacks, this project delivers: a win-condition with lighting, sound and flame effect display. Bluntly, we feel that a game of Simon to be passed around with a light, sound and flame effect display is a winning combination.
title: Simon
print_description: Simon debuted in 1978 at Studio 54, and it remains an enduring pop-culture reference to the 1980’s. We revive this great game in playa-compliant fashi

description: Today, if you get a boner, you get to keep it--for as long as it wants to be a boner. Grow it naturally, or strap it on. You don't have to suppress it just so someone doesn't judge you for being a pig or get jealous because it's not for her or him. Today it's okay to have just woken up in the morning, okay to be stimulated by your own silky boxers, and okay to be TURNED ON, because you have a right to your feelings and you get to do whatever you want with your body.
title: Socially Appropriate Boner Day
print_description: Today, if you get a boner, you get to keep it--for as long as it wants to be a boner. Grow it naturally, or strap it on!

description: What's the big deal? Burping is fun and it's free! Who gets to decide the acceptableness of burping? You do! Just for today, let all burping be considered socially appropriate. Buuuuuuuurp!!!
title: Socially Appropriate Burp Day
print_description: What's the big deal? Burping is fun and it's free! Who gets to decide the acceptableness of burping? You do! Buuuuuuuurp!!!

description: Did you know that the more oxygenated your food is, the better you taste it? That's why ice cream tastes better with a fork than with a spoon. And that's why our natural inclination is to eat with our mouths open. What's the big deal about what it looks like? You're willing to put it in your mouth and chew but you're not willing to look at it? That's like a carnivore who's unwilling to kill their own cow. So, go ahead and taste what you've been missing—today you can eat with your mouth OPEN!
title: Socially Appropriate Eat-With-Your-Mouth-Open Day
print_description: Did you know that the more oxygenated your food is, the better you taste it? That's why ice cream tastes better with a fork than with a spoon.

description: It's not like you have to pack it out or anything. You don't even have to go down the block with a spare roll of toilet paper. Just do it right where you are. It's time to celebrate our farts and acknowledge that it's about time we got over that harmless smell. What's the big deal? You're human for christsake! Today you can feel free to fart any old time as loudly and as smellily as you want!
title: Socially Appropriate Fart Day
print_description: It's not like you have to pack it out or anything. Today you can feel free to fart any old time as loudly and as smellily as you want!

description: Hey, menstruation is totally natural—you don't have to be embarrassed just because you have a naturally occurring blood flow. Give yourself permission to go without a tampon or pad for once. Wear white pants with no underwear. Embrace freedom! Let the blood make its artistic mark! Today is the day to feel like a natural Womyn!!!
title: Socially Appropriate Menstruation Day

description: Who wants to suffer with a bunch of dried up gunk and crust in their nose? Get those dried up playa boogers out of there already! And go ahead, flick it on the ground because that's where that stuff came from.
title: Socially Appropriate Nose Picking Day
print_description: Don't suffer with a bunch of dried up gunk and crust in your nose. Go ahead and have the relief you deserve and breathe just a little freer.

No need to suppress today because today is Socially Appropriate Yawn Day!

description:
On a mission to raise the planetary vibration through music, music producer & DJ, Brandon Au aka Sol Rising, is healing the world one ecstatic beat at a time. Brandon’s transformative, transcendental sound invites us on a journey to remember our true Nature—moving from fear to Love.

As a conscious dance DJ, Sol Rising creates an alchemical musical journey to be experienced in body, mind, and spirit. He works with the energy behind the music, and listeners often report feeling “high” on the dance floor—activated by the elevated frequencies of the danceable DJ grooves.

Sol Rising is carving a new genre of music that fuses many influences together. As a music producer, his extraordinary soundscapes inspire feelings of bliss and joy, which are reflected in his eclectic mix of hip-hop, funk, soul, reggae, and electronic dance beats.
title: Sol Rising @ RhythmWave
print_description: As a conscious dance DJ, Sol Rising creates an alchemical musical journey to be experienced in body, mind, and spirit.

description:
Start off your week on the Playa with a foundation of deep relaxation, slow breaths and easy yoga poses to keep you feeling resilient and energetic, no matter how much you dance, indulge and play.  Special attention will be paid to balancing out all the stimulation the Playa offers your nervous system. This soothing, grounding, mellow yoga practice will be accessible for yogis of all levels.  

Please bring a mat, as well as a sarong, towel, scarf or belt.

We'll meet behind the Temple, as to enjoy the peace it attracts as well as the beauty of the landscape beyond our fair city.

Britt Fohrman fell in love with yoga in 1993 and has been teaching since 1997. While her foundation is rooted in the Iyengar lineage, a 10 year struggle with chronic illness inspired her to go deeply into Restorative Yoga, Viniyoga and Buddhism. Having studied therapeutic yoga and movement with many of the leaders in the field, Britt still believes it's her own healing journey, as well as that of her students, that has taught her the most. Along with her steadfast belief in the healing power of yoga, Britt brings resourcefulness and warmth to her classes. Her style of teaching emphasizes individualized alignment, meditative focus and breath guided movement; imbued with levity, compassion and honesty. She encourages you to step out of your head, into your body and on a yoga journey that supports you wherever you are. One of Britt's specialties lies in working with childbearing women, where she also employs her talents as a photographer, doula, childbirth educator and bodyworker. A passionate adventurer and athlete, Britt spends most of her free time traveling, surfing, hiking with her dog and dancing with the performance art group Billion Jelly Bloom. (Who she's camping and performing with on the Playa)

Find out more about Britt and her practice at www.brittfohrman.com.
title: Soothing Sunset Yoga at the Temple
print_description: A mellow, grounding yoga practice accessible for all levels, with an emphasis on deep relaxation, slow breaths & easy, gentle yoga poses. Bring a mat.

description:
Performance Art Opportunity
The South Bay Regional (SF Bay Area)has been accepted to this years Burning Man’s Circle Of Regional Effigies. Our Effigy this year is our celebration of one of the earliest depictions of a Cargo Cult, the California Missions. We are looking for men and woman to impersonate priests and nuns. You will hear confessions, dispense words of wisdom in our authentic confessional! Volunteers are being accepted for 1 hr. shifts on Mon. thru Wed. Also opportunities to be on the fire perimeter Thurs. night, 7:00 – 9:00PM.
Please contact Root at, hightech.ken@gmail com.

description: The now infamous camp challenge is back. With origins dating all the way back to the 1980s, this camping tradition has morphed into something truly monstrous. During the heat of the day, in triple digit temperatures, one must eat a helping of five-alarm chili, cooked with the dreaded Guatemalan insanity pepper (grown only by the inmates of a Guatemalan insane asylum). Then, to wash it down, a shot of hot pepper vodka, also infused with the same insanely hot pepper. Now, when you want nothing more than an ice-cold beverage to quench the fire burning in your mouth, you instead must chug a cheap, warm beer that's been sitting out in the sun since daybreak. Why, might you ask, would anyone want to do this? Hell if we know! It's a terrible idea! It's a horrible thing to conceive, much less do on purpose! Yet, as demonstrated by the droves of people who participated AND completed the challenge in past years, we apparently underestimated human nature. Not only did crowds show up for the challenge, but they returned over the course of the week to to share the pain with their friends. And by share, we mean point and laugh while grown men cried and stumbled down the street in a daze. We even had a university anthropologist come hangout, just to observe this odd aspect of human behavior.  We're bringing it back spicier than ever for 2013!
title: So You Think You're Hot?
print_description: The Challenge - Can you handle the heat?

description: Have you always dreamed of throwing down a legendary DJ set at one of the hottest camps on the playa? Well, how bad do you Want It? We've got 10,000 watts of juicy sound, some of the best real estate in Black Rock City, and a nighttime crowd just waiting to be whipped into a frenzy. All you have to do is wow our panel of judges and you too could be headlining Burning Man! For this contest we hearken back to that seminal masterpiece of talent programs: The Gong Show. Perhaps you remember the cringe-worthy showcase of questionable performances that critics could halt by striking a loud gong. This event is eerily similar, only ours has balls. Ovaries too. Giant, dusty gonads. Can you hang? Instead of a gong, DJs will wear a shock collar and get buzzed off stage by volts of harsh rejection if they fail to impress. Instead of regaling us with tap dancing, DJs break out their most mind blowing tracks and slickest tricks. Instead of a paltry sum to commemorate victory, winners will be invited back during peak hours to pound the dance floor into submission. This is open decks for the fearless. Bring it.
title: "So You Wanna Be A DJ" Shock Collar Gong Show
print_description: Your fresh DJ skillz could get you a prime slot on the Esplanade if you play your tracks right!

description: We offer spankings to all walks of life so long as you are 18 years of age or older (we reserve the right to ask for ID). We will have a variety of spanking stations and implements to use if bare handed is not your style. Once you have had your fill of spankings you may return to the street or you can come on back to the legendary Xanadome and chill out and relax. Have a drink if you'd like and a freshly baked cookie to reward yourself for a good spanking.  For the curious here is a quick FAQ on spanking.       1) How hard do I have to get spanked.  ANSWER: how hard do you want to be spanked?       2) How many swats do I need to receive to get a cookie?  ANSWER: At least one.    3) I am diabetic/not hungry/gluten intolerant/etc. and do not want a cookie, just a spanking is that okay?     ANSWER: Absolutely, you do not have to receive a cookie to get a spanking, but you must get a spanking to get a cookie.           4) Can I spank you?    ANSWER:  Ask us, we may or may not let you. Cuteness and snuggly bribery or swag works well.        5) I want my partner/friend to spank me instead of you, is that okay.     ANSWER: Of course. Please remember we want to keep you in your comfort zone.     6) Does it have to be bare bottom spanking or is that optional?    ANSWER:  That is completely up to your comfort zone. We will accommodate your limits.
title: Spankings and Cookies
print_description: Otis Spankmore at Silicon Village welcomes the 18+ to get spanked or spank a friend and chill out in the legendary Xanadome with a fresh baked cookie.

description:
Welcome to the Chapel of Love at the Stardust Lounge Casino & Spa! We will be open daily for drop-in weddings between Monday, 8/26 and Saturday, 8/31. Our hours are noon -- 5pm and by appointment.

Visitors of all genders can experience the joy of matrimony in a (non-legally-binding) ritual. Elvis or Mr. Stardust might serenade you as our beautiful showgirls celebrate your nuptials in Vegas fashion. Not sure what kind of Playa wedding you want? Spin the Wedding Roulette wheel and find out! Need your Playa wedding annulled? We'll do that too! 

Note: please feel free to contact us if you want to schedule a special ceremony outside our "regular" daytime hours. We're here for you!

description: Create a completely unique, never before seen creature at this hands-on crafting session. We’ll tear apart stuffed animals of all shapes and sizes and reassemble them into one-of-a-kind reflections of our personal playa spirits. Build a catagator, bunnysaurus or lumpylurp! We’ve got plenty of stuffed animals to share, but feel free to bring your own. We’ll provide sewing stuff, buttons and other decorative details. Please bring your happy crafty creative energy, and come stitch up the perfect plush playa pal!

print_description: Create a unique creature at this hands-on crafting session, tearing apart stuffed animals of and reassembling them into fantastical playa creatures.

description:
Come join Madi's Playa Choir for a moving musical experience on Sunday morning. This year, the choir will perform 2 services, one at 6am at the Temple of Whollyness and at 11am at Camp Playatel. We sing, we talk, we commune, we pray to all Divine beings and we send you off with music in your soul, a message from inspired speakers and a renewed committment to love, creativity, peace, understanding and life through the experience of the Playa Choir's Sunday morning service...
Search youtube for playa choir and you'll see what we've been up to these last seven years...See you on Sunday morning. Get to the 11am service early, as we are generally full to capacity in the dome...The temple ceremony will have unlimited space.
title: Sunday Morning Gospel Service
print_description: A non-dogmatic, playa-style, ecumenical Sunday service, complete with a 65-voice choir, band, speakers and communion!

description: Come learn to use cyanotype emulsion to print images with the sun! Some materials will be provided for creating images, but feel free to bring your own items to print with as well. print_description: Come learn to use cyanotype emulsion to print images w/ the sun! Some materials will be provided for creating images, but feel free to bring your own.

description: High five Burner Shabbat!  Become the Bumbling Backward's Burner Band.  Perform the Traditional Nuevo-Kabbalistic rite of playing your instrument while marching backwards around the Temple.  We provide and teach the nign (simple hypnotic tune).  You come to make music as the sun sets - with your instrument (or bodies, voices or whatever ya got).  Silent backwards bumblers wanted too!  Meet around the left side of the Temple (coming from center camp).  Unequivocally ecumenical.  (say that five times fast). Intrigued but unsure?  Google backwards march.

print_description: High five Shabbat!  Nuevo-kabbalistic backwards marching band. Bring instruments, voices or just feet.   Easy tune. Unequivocally ecumenical.

description:
Cargo Cult John Frum's Troops has landed at SwagMart with a remarkable and exciting collection of gifts for the Natives of Black Rock City. Our much sought after cherished Burning Man Date Pins, Earrings, Necklaces and Playa Post Cards are waiting for you when you appear at our " Costume Appreciation Window " in Wearable Art, or something you might not wear in the Default World. Check out our huge selection of Black Rock City Trophy's for those WOW factor Costumes. Visit our evening Branding sessions with World famous Sculpter Todd Andrews. His creative designs of the Man, Burning Woman and eight new designs this year of Fire Hot impressions for your Boots, Hats, Shoes, Belts, Wallets, Purses and anything Leather.
Look for the SwagMart fascade with the Giant Bamboo Airplane. SwagMart is open every day Monday thru Sunday
title: SwagMart
print_description: Cargo Cult's Troops have landed at SwagMart with a remarkable collection of gifts for the Natives of Black Rock City.Find the Giant Bamboo Airplane.

description: 5Rhythms is an in-bodied, out of your mind dance experience not to be missed. It is a simple, powerful moving meditation that anyone – of any age, size, or physical ability - can practice. There are no steps to follow, no choreography to learn, no way to do it wrong. The only requirement is a body that is still breathing, a heart that is still beating, and mind that is still curious! Just like light, sound or ocean waves, a dancing body when moving freely passes through five distinct rhythmic patterns. These patterns continuously repeat themselves in a wave of motion. The 5Rhythms are: FLOWING – the fluid, continuous, grounded glide of our own movements STACCATO – the percussive, pulsing beat that shapes us a thousand different ways CHAOS – the rhythm of letting go, releasing into the catalytic wildness of our dance that can never be planned or repeated LYRICAL – the rhythm of trance, where the weight of self-consciousness dissolves, where we lighten up and disappear into our own uniqueness STILLNESS – the quiet emptiness, where gentle movements rise and fall, start and end, in a field of silence Please join RhythmWave as we return to the Black Rock City for our seventh year with this gorgeous dance/meditation practice that we love to share with you!
title: Sweat Your Prayers
print_description: Sweat Your Prayers/ 5Rhythms is is a simple, powerful moving meditation that anyone – of any age, size, or physical ability - can practice.  Join us!

description:
Tantric Qigong: The Alchemy of Love 
•	A playful exploration of love relationships as a spiritual practice.  Learn exercises to deepen trust & communications.  All couples welcome. 
All couples are invited to this playful exploration of intimate partnership and love as a spiritual practice and path to realization.   Harness the wisdom of the body and the physical sensations of love to deepen trust, strengthen communications, and create a powerful shared vision for your love relationship.   Discover ancient Yogic, Tantric, and Taoist exercises that will allow you to gain deep insight into your relationship and see your partner in a whole new light, whether you just met on the playa or renewing your vows on your 40th anniversary. You will experience your partner’s love and trust in a new and profound way. Learn how to use these powerful skills and movements to create a new and exciting level of intimacy that deepens the physical, spiritual, and emotional aspects of your sacred connection.  We will explore couple-hood as a yogic path to realization, letting go of the mind and surrendering to the heart through your lover. It is a practice of using your two-ness to realize oneness.  Yoga and Qigong are like brother and sister. Both are esoteric, alchemical practices that were created for self-realization, with exercise being a secondary benefit. Qigong is much gentler than most forms of yoga, and a wonderful compliment to a vigorous yoga practice. Both practices have a common source, Neolithic shamanic practices, and both are ancient books of wisdom written in the language of the body. We'll physically explore the connection between these 2 books of wisdom within the context of your love relationship. We are channeling the sexual and creative energies of the body through visualization, movement, ritual, and breath, not sexual activity. Tantric Qigong is an intimate practice of being gentle with oneself and weaving one's own sexual energy, becoming truly receptive.
title: Tantric Qigong: The Alchemy of Love
print_description: A playful exploration of love relationships as a spiritual practice.  Learn exercises to deepen trust & communications. Couples welcome. Body wisdom.

description:
I am writing to ask you to share this message with your community.  

Want to be a part of the art community at Burning Man? This is your chance to create your flag, your art, your message, and your vision of the future, in your own space. It will become part of a giant community tapestry wall on The Life Cube, sharing what’s in your head and your heart with the citizens of Black Rock City and the world. 

We’ve made it easy to order a blank canvas for $15 (that includes shipping)! Come on folks; help make this an amazing success. It will be fun, it will be exciting! And tell your friends, your kids, your camp-mates.  (You can also pick up a canvas at your local art supply store).

Interested? Click here to find out more, order a canvas, and reserve your space on the wall: http://thelifecube.wordpress.com/2013/06/08/lifecubetapestrywall/. There’s also a Facebook page @ http://www.facebook.com/TheLifeCube

Thanks in advance for your consideration.  

skeeter
Artist, The Life Cube
title: Tapestry Wall on The Life Cube
print_description: Your chance to create your flag, your art, your message, and your vision of the future and include it on the Tapestry Wall of The Life Cube.

description:
TEDxBlackRockCity is a one-day event (August 29, 2013) of talks and performances around this years theme:  Paradigm - Shift.

Our speakers and performers reflect a wide variety of the creative dimensions of Black Rock City, a temporary city of over 50,000 people formed in the Nevada desert once a year to celebrate art and creative freedom.

Black Rock City — or Burning Man — the largest intentional community on earth, and one of the world’s most vibrantly creative places, will provide an especially powerful setting for this investigation. 

On its most basic level, TEDxBlackRockCity will provide a stage for some of Burning Man’s most visionary inhabitants to speak about their ideas and their creations. On a deeper level, it will draw on the very values of Burning Man, whose Ten Principles (radical inclusion, gifting, de-commodification, radical, self-reliance, radical self-expression, communal effort, civic responsibility, leaving no trace, participation, and immediacy) will provide touchstones for the speakers in their talks.

Indeed, it is in the spirit of the 10 Principles, TEDxBlackRockCity aims to be more than merely a staged performance. For it is intended, above all, to foster creativity among all of its remarkable participants — both on stage and off — drawing on the uniquely dynamic community of Burning Man to concoct an exemplar of that fertile soup churning with creative sparks.

Please join us for an exciting day at Play)A(Skool and the new Aspire "Learning Center" --- a collaborative interactivity zone created by Play)A(Skool, IDEATE and La Calaca.
title: TEDxBlackRockCity
print_description: TEDxBlackRockCity is a one-day event of talks and performances around this years theme:  Paradigm - Shift. Hosted at Play)A(Skool at the 3:00 Keyhole.

description:
"Leave your Overly Attached Girlfriends at center camp, but bring your Good Girl Ginas.  Enjoy the ""Friend Zone"" hammock space 20 feet above the Esplanade in our ridiculously photogenic dome. Advice Mallard sa.......god.  

3 years....... I have been doing these things for 3 years.  Stupid line after stupid line.  There is more to life them memes and pictures of fucking cats!  

I don't know what to write.  Do you people even read these?  I'm not a ""clever man"". Do You Have idea how long it took me to write the short description?  Like any idea?  I hate to write and that shit took me like 2 hours.  Really! Like 2 entire hours.  

Trying to think of lame punchy puns just for your enjoyment. Trying to get The Burning Man Meet-Up ""back to it's roots"". I mean half you fucking people will still miss the event and be like ""I meant to go, but 15 drag queens in an art car wanted to have mimosas at the trash fence"".  YOU HAD ONE JOB, make it to the meet-up and pretend to not hate people for like a couple hours, but no you couldn't get your dusty, sun burnt ass out of your hexayurt.  I don't know what I was expecting.  Honestly I don't even know why I bother.  Fuck you people!
"
title: The 3rd [A]nnual r/burningman Reddit Meet-up
print_description: I'll see your shitty burn and raise you The 3rd [A]nnual r/burningman Reddit Meet-up.

description: The primary purpose of the Burning Man Project is to uphold and manifest the values described in the 10 principles of Burning Man. "Burning Man" is understood not as an event but as a way of life lived consistently with the 10 principles. Burning Man Project provides infrastructural tools and frameworks that allow people to apply the 10 principles in many communities and spheres of endeavors.  Come learn more and find out how you can get involved.
title: The Burning Man Project
print_description: The primary purpose of the Burning Man Project is to uphold and manifest the values described in the 10 principles of Burning Man.

description:
The essence of the Heart of Now is the practice of being present with your whole self. In The Heart of Now workshop, you’ll come to know yourself more deeply. You’ll discover the possibility of reconnection with your innate beauty, wholeness and be honest with yourself and and with others in a safe circle of love. You can discover those places you’ve felt stuck, while you are supported in letting go. You learn to become aware of those times when you get in your own way, and come to see the choices open to you. You embrace what you desire the most, and deeply commit to letting your dreams and your visions be more important than you past wounds. You will find yourself reconnecting with your innate beauty, wholeness and power in each moment.

Heart of Now workshops include numerous assistants to support you and to create a sacred space for transformation. A deeply nurturing environment is created. This teamwork approach deepens the experience of service and camaraderie, where all are able to experience their vulnerabilities, allowing trust and growth. For questions visit our website www.HeartOfNow.org.
title: The Heart of Now
print_description: You’ll come to know yourself more deeply-discover the possibility of reconnection with your innate beauty, wholeness and be honest with yourself.

description: It's all about perception!  Learn how we see from the molecular level through cognition, and about the most common types of visual hallucination patterns.  Topics will include hallucinatory disorders, sensory-deprivation hallucinatory symptoms, and substance-specific induced hallucinations. Mo has been a developmental neurobiology and neuroimmunology researcher at major universities, so come and feel free to ask some questions!
title: The Neurobiology of Hallucination
print_description: Learn how we see from the molecular level through cognition and about the most common types of visual hallucination patterns.

description:
Come hang out in our cozy chill domes and learn about secular meditation, have a blended margarita, and Om it up with your hOmies. We are teaching people to Om and recording their unique voice to be layered into an audio file with hundreds(thousands?) of other voices. 

The recording station is at our camp, Omitting Station, 9:15 and D, last chance to record is Saturday at 10:00AM (1:00PM if you come with bacon). 

This recording will be played (at least) twice: Once at 8PM Saturday at the Man, and once after the temple burn on Sunday from our friends Nexus Bobo's Bayou (art car). We welcome you to our camp, come make your voice heard and join in the unity of the Om of Burning Man!
title: The Om of Burning Man
print_description: Come record your Om along with hundreds of other Burners and hear the layered file played at the end of the week!

description: The Orgasamator returns to the Camp for Sensual Pleasures, in Spanky's Village. The Orgasmatron had been a fixture at Burning Man for many years, giving thousands of women exceptional physical pleasure in an environment that was very safe, comfortable and private. Three years ago we took everything we had learned and completely redesigned the machine for even greater intensity and enjoyment, and we gave it a new name: The Orgasamator. This year we’ve taken it that much further with a singular goal of maximizing our guests’ overall pleasure, along with the comfort and sensuality of the environment. When you visit, you will be in a private room with an operator who is experienced, very sensitive to your needs and concerns, who listens well and is deeply dedicated to giving you an amazing experience in an environment that is safe, comfortable and private, and which leaves you feeling completely respected and in control. Come solo, or better yet, bring a good friend (male or female) to add another dimension to this deeply immersive and wonderfully personal experience. You can wear as much or as little as you would like while riding this marvelous machine, and you can stop any time if the pleasure becomes too intense. If you are a woman, the Orgasamator Experience at our I-Scream Parlour is something you won't want to miss. Visit us at the Camp for Sensual Pleasures, in Spanky’s Village, and also ask about The Pope’s Massage & Hair washing.
title: The Orgasamator Experience
print_description: For women, extreme physical pleasure in a safe, comfortable & private space. We’re sensitive to your needs & desires, & promise an amazing experience.

when the human heart is surrounded by rhythmic low frequencies of the right meter, it aligns with the beat. we hope to get every speaker on the playa to play a steady bass-laden heartbeat for five minutes in 2013.

tune into BMIR 94.5 FM or gather at the temple to participate.

description: Ahoy landlubbers! Come help us celebrate the birthing of The Racken!, a giant octopus bike rack (which is also a 2013 honorarium art project.)  A wonderful ceremony will commence before sun down and we will all welcome this giant beast to the playa.  And I can imagine we will also park our bikes on it seeing that that is what it's for.  Be sure to wear red and silver!

description: Join us for an intentional ceremony of dancing freedom.  Calling in a deeper inquiry of discovering what it means to find the beat… again and again and again… always returning to this sense of home within.  As we immerse ourselves into the felt sense of what happens when we notice this place of consistency, as well as the spaces in between new insights emerge. The constant movement of balance can begin to allow the greater rhythms of life and playa to organize our inner worlds.

print_description: Join us for an intentional ceremony of dancing freedom. Allow the greater rhythms of life and playa to organize our inner worlds.

description:
THONG PARTY and NAKED MASS WEDDING!
WHO: Hosted by Elvis Wedding Chapel & Salvage Gardens
WHEN: Wednesday, August 28, 4 p.m. to 7 p.m.
WHERE: Near 7:30 and Desiderata, Black Rock City, NV
WHAT: Bare-Ass Bachelor & Bachelorette Bash, Thong Thing and Mass Nude Wedding!*

Black Rock City’s most daring and audacious lovers and all of their uninhibited friends over 21 are invited to doff their duds and frolic in the buff at this cheeky cocktail affair, starting at 4 p.m. WEDNESDAY, August 28, in the lovely and exotic Salvage Gardens, surrounding the Bell Tower at the Elvis Wedding Chapel, located at 7:30 and Desiderata.

Blushing brides, grinning grooms and fun-loving partygoers of all persuasions will sip Margarita Blasters and move to groovy upbeat dance tunes in the Gardens, browse through the Chapel and adjacent Bridezilla Lounge, play provocative party games, model free thongs, and check out the alluring Chamber of Inappropriate Massage. It all climaxes with a Mass Nude Wedding* for our Brides and Grooms beginning at 6:30. Dress code for guests: Birthday suits, or: thongs; shirtcocking; grass skirts & leis. Vow to attend!
 
(*NOTE: The Elvis Wedding Chapel proudly performs ersatz playa wedding ceremonies; as such, no tedious paperwork or official documentation is required! Nonetheless, our weddings are guaranteed to last as long as your devotion to each other. The Chapel’s additional availability for legal matrimony—as sanctioned by the State of Nevada—is by special arrangement only.)
title: THONG PARTY and NAKED MASS WEDDING!
print_description: Bachelor/Bachelorette Bash ThongThing & MassNude Wedding for Brides & Grooms. Grass skirts, thongs or sunscreen! Blaster elixir toast, & FREE thongs!

description: But Blaine, what about prom? It’s Thursday night at Black Rock Yearbook! Whether you’re a wallflower, jock, pretty-in-pink sparkle pony or a shirt cocker in tails, come join the Black Rock Yearbook staffers to get photographed for the 2013 Black Rock Yearbook. While you may have visited Yearbook in the day, this is your chance to be photographed in your best nighttime playa finery. Enjoy prom tunes while you wait. description:
There is nothing more basic intimate connection you can have with another person than touch. There are things which can be erotic, silly, or basic than the touch that leads to tickling. Tickling is a great way to explore a new avenue of fun and intimacy with your partner. It can be light, it can be soft, or it can be heavy and sadistic. 

We will cover many aspects of tickling from playing with others, simple bondage techniques, wrestling, common toys you can use to make your partner cry out in fits of laughter, to discussions of how it can spice up your sex life.  We will cover some aspects of BDSM for the full spectrum of tickling fun.  In addition we will cover the proper etiquette for playing with someone new to you.


 There will also have a tickle challenge for the most ticklish man and woman attending the event. Those two will be tickled by our event  coordinators, the partner, and whomever else the person is comfortable with. The person who lasts the longest of tickle torment will win a cool prize and be crowned tickle king or queen of Black Rock City.

You must be 18 years of age or older to attend this event. This event is best suited for those with a partner. If you do not have a partner that does not mean you cannot attend. We cannot guarantee you will have a partner to play with, but we will try and match you up with someone or one of our instructors.


Do be respectful of others and their boundaries. Just remember we are all here for fun, and we have at least two things in common. We are interested/curious about tickling and we are all burners.
title: Tickling for fits and giggles
print_description: Explore your partner's tickle spots in the Illumelodie dome in Silicon Village. Bring a towel/blanket and be 18+. Can you take our tickle challenge?

description:
ATTENTION ON DECK-)'(-
Bring all your soft and fuzzy goodness onto the flight deck for a night cruising the Playa then dropping anchor somewhere in Deep Playa till the sun starts to shine.
Find a comfy spot on deck and get cozzy with your first mate. Chill music, slow moves and having a good time is what the goal is here. Cuddle Puddles welcomed. No real wild dancing on this night just a relaxed sail with a group of lovers cuddled up for some top secret fun.
Couples are encouraged to join us. Once the flight deck is full we will be setting sail for the entire evening. Plan ahead with water, warmth, and snacks (wink). We will stop by rest rooms here and there but PLAN AHEAD!!!!
Bring your childhood spirit and join us for the first ever Aircraft Carrier Flight Deck Slumber Party.

description:
This is a day-long game and unconference for academics, nerds, teachers, edtech innovators and anyone interested in the future of learning. 

We will be solving many challenges together from 10-4 and we encourage you to pack a snack and stay the day for discussions, talks, creative workshops and opportunities to go on a transformational journey with new playa friends.

10:00 AM- Open Space – sign up for afternoon sessions. Welcome by Nolan Bushnell Go out and have a transformational adventure!

12:30PM -Potlatch BYO DIY, food, guest talks on educational technologies, learning and engagement, games, core and flipping blended experiential interactivity. Talk with Singularity University & THNK.

1:30PM UNCONFERENCE – OPEN SESSIONS FOR EVERYONE

Burning Nerds, Geeks & Doctors....Bring your own talks!

30 MIN & 1 HR CONVERSATIONS on your geeky educational interests
4PM- Closing by Brian Behlendorf with a reading of your collective manifesto for learning

Join Dr. Wendy Clupper-Meier and your favorite nerds, geeks and dorks as the hottest minds on the playa celebrate the creation.

description:

Cymatica presents:
In 2005, filmmaker Keith Busha found himself drawn to Italy to view and film the art of a unique, largely unknown community. He found their extensive and extraordinary art to be only a very small piece of a story that consumed him for years. After many trips and much research, this self-proclaimed, road weary skeptic opened his eyes and mind to the wonders of this enlightened and innovative community.

print_description: A multilayered journey to heart of a new, growing civilization. A society where nothing is impossible + there are no limits to what can be done.

Electronic Awakening is an ethnographic Documentary film which investigates the spirituality of the Electronic Dance Music Culture. Documentary Sound Arts film Electronic Awakening follows "...dozens of experts, visionaries, and published authors who explore the premise that Electronic Music is spiritual technology that allows access to higher states of consciousness" Directed by Andrew Johner of the Electronic Music Alliance.

description: I was not in touch with my own loneliness.  I did not realize how loneliness affected all my relationships including the relationship with myself.  Learn how I transformed my life by finding where my feelings of loneliness started, and with the help of my higher self and new actions transformed my loneliness into solitude (spiritual connection) and improved the relationship with myself and others.  Class will include instructor’s story and lessons learned followed by group sharing and then a 20 minute meditation to start your transformation.
title: Transforming loneliness into solitude
print_description: Learn how I transformed my life by finding the source of my loneliness and transformed it into solitude by taking simple actions (w/ group sharing).

description:
Even though almost everybody in this world uses money every single day, very few people think about what money is, how it works, and how it maybe might work in a different way. How it could be redefined or even changed. Isn’t money after all just a tool?
Our current form of Money, detached from any tangible asset and only backed by our trust, has seemingly taken on the role of an omnipresent Philosopher’s Stone, magically turning any quality of life into a measurable quantity of bigger or smaller heaps of cash, or rather digits on our computer screen. But not all values and qualities can be converted that easily into a pile of banknotes. After all, isn’t what we really value in life ‘priceless’?
title: TRANSFORMONEY 2.0 - talk by Dadara
print_description: Even though almost everybody in this world uses money every single day, very few people think about what money is and how it works.

description:
"Experiences of Transpersonal Phenomena Induced by Electronic Dance Music Events" 

Audrey Katherine, PhD will be presenting her dissertation research which used qualitative and intuitive inquiry research methods to explore the types of transpersonal phenomena that people experience at electronic dance music (EDM) events and how these experiences integrate into day-to-day life. Twelve participants were interviewed and a thematic content analysis was conducted on the data, revealing the following overarching themes: Interpersonal relationships with the numinous, spiritual beings, and human beings are fostered; occurrence of transformative intrapersonal experiences; electronic dance music and its effects on the mind and body serve as a catalyst for experiences of transpersonal phenomena; experiences of a spiritual and mystical nature transpire; emphasis placed on the significance of set and setting. Findings suggest that having experiences of transpersonal phenomena at EDM events enhances health and wellbeing in day-to-day life.
title: Transpersonal Phenomena Induced by EDM
print_description: This Palenque Norte discussion will explore transpersonal phenomena that people experience at electronic dance music (EDM) events.

description: Come by for a refreshing dip in the multi-sensory waves we will be deluging once again at Camp Tsunami Bass Experience, located at 10 o'clock & deep playa. For our third incarnation the TBE~WaVe~ installation, our body~sonic dance platforms that afford participants a uniquely interactive experience to engage kinesthetically with the music, we are upping the visual ante with the addition of a 30ft. dome to our public frontage. This structure, which will be combined with our wave sculpture, will be curated by the visualist CINEMOEBA, who, as per his 2012 work, will once again be providing a wonderland of analog feedback & other projected delights. This in combination with our live fusion and  Dubstep centric line-up featuring some of the finest bass culture talent available on playa, denizens of Black Rock City can expect a fourth dimensional EXPERIENCE like no other. Come wobble the TBE~WaVe~ and challenge your perceptions of bass culture music from every learning and thinking modality. Discover the optimal conditions for proper bass culture appreciation, the facilitation of which is our primary mission. We are devoted to ensuring the Tsunami Bass well~spring of proper bass culture on playa is properly nurtured and celebrated at Burning Man. As the TBE Multiversity of Bass Culture Appreciation founders will preach, proper edutainment is our main goal.  We invite you to open your heart/mind and try a new "substance over style" attuned environment, carefully curated by bass culture artists (Established by the Tsunami Bass Experience's Morphous & ShiZaru) for artists & aficionados. This is not a "nightclub on playa" but rather a welcome respite for those seeking low-end frequency with the utmost decency... join us for a more intimate and holistically immersive esthetic environment in which you will experience a full range of frequencies, with the decibels enlightenly engineered properly. Line-up will be posted to the internets so find us!! ~Cheers!~}*{~ (BYOB, NO MOOP)

description: Every year the Unicorns come from the Enchanted Forest to play at Burningman. We bring magick and innocence to the playa and we fart butterflies and poop rainbows. There is a rumor that we eat bunnies, and it is true, but only with their consent. They like it. It tickles. Then they turn into candy. In the Enchanted Forest we are always having big lovely orgies with our friends. We like orgies, and we are always horny!! At burningman we are having a stampede, taking our unbridled joy and annoyingly perky enthusiasm across the playa. Join us! We will be galloping around making a nuisance of ourselves, stampeding through people's camps spreading our intolerably positive energy throughout the festival. We will start at 6.30pm, and then stampede around who knows where as the sun sets. We will provide horns to those who are horn deficient. We really can't wait to meet you! Squeeeee!

description:
VortexHealing® Divine Energy Healing utilizes Divine Light and Consciousness to effect healing and transformation on the deepest levels, including physical, emotional, spiritual, and karmic. Most forms of energy healing, such as Reiki, utilize the energy of manifested life. However, Vortex makes use of divine light and energy, which is more powerful, and can work more deeply, than the energy of manifested life alone. Vortex utilizes 49 different kinds of divine light that serve various functions, including energizing, clearing, purifying, releasing, etc. Finally, all of these forms of divine light are guided by divine consciousness, which brings the deepest power of transformation, i.e. healing separation consciousness. 

This workshop will feature two Omega-level practitioners of VortexHealing® Divine Energy Healing who will facilitate a small group healing on a topic to be determined at the time of the workshop. Space will be limited to about 15 people.
title: VortexHealing Workshop

description: This 2 hour class will gently guide you through each of the rhythms: flowing, staccato, chaos, lyrical and stillness. Each rhythm focuses on a simple movement quality rather than a specific form or set of steps, giving everyone the freedom to move in ways that feel authentic without any pressure to get it right. With a little instruction, the experience of the 5Rhythms opens us deeply and helps us move beyond self-consciousness to an authentic connection to our body and life force. Using the discipline of each rhythm and the breath as a catalyst for movement, you will be invited to embody, follow, express, and release your own energy. In the end, you will find yourself renewed and reconnected to your own self, feeling fully alive.
title: What are those 5Rhythms Anyway?
print_description: This class will gently guide you through each of the rhythms: flowing, staccato, chaos, lyrical and stillness. Good for beginners or advanced dancers!

description:
Are you interested in what the Burning Man Project has been up to over the last year?  We’d love to share our stories with you.  Please come visit us at Everywhere on the Esplanade. 

Burning Man’s outreach groups and affiliated organizations, (The Burning Man Project, Burners Without Borders, The Black Rock Arts Foundation, Black Rock Solar, and The Burning Man Regional Network) have teamed up to create a unified presence on the playa that we call the “Everywhere Pavilion.”

Join us in celebration of the Outreach Network!
*  Everywhere Opening Reception, ‘Party Everywhere,’ on Monday, 5:00 - 7:00pm
*  Black Rock Solar Summit, Tuesday, 5:00 – 7:00 pm
*  BRAF Reception, Thursday, 4:00 – 6:00 pm

description:
Johnna Froma is an actual and non-chauvinistic representation of this year’s art theme and the Burning Man icon in general. Her son, John Froma (some say “frum Amerika”), unwittingly brought technological cargo to a relatively unspoiled culture. His gift (and her namesake) changed over time as the native population developed an appetite for and ultimately a reliance on all things technological. Those—YOU—who are participant in a culture promoting such cargo may query Johnna regarding its worth.

Judith Dierkes 
Judithdierkes.weebly.com
title: Where's JOHNNA FROMA
print_description: Johnna Froma is an actual and non-chauvinistic representation of this year’s art theme and the Burning Man icon in general.

description:
Wait, we have to go a whole week without logging in to play computer games? Better believe by Saturday there’s a lot of us going to be jonesing for our fix. That doesn’t just apply to those of us in camp, there’s thousands of people out on the playa that will be getting the mouse-hand shakes by the weekend. Since popping up the laptop and logging on isn’t an option, we’ll just have ourselves an addiction party instead.

Open to all everyone, gamer or not, we’ll have a little gathering Saturday afternoon. Anyone who has completed our daily quests, or just wants to hang out and get their fix is welcome. Our resident mad alchemist has come up with some special brews, and servings of delicious chocolate cake are available to all. If any of our "Dragonbreath" chili remains, it’s a great time to polish that off. Hang out, drink some "kungaloosh", take down a "sulfuron slammer", and swap war stories of "How I wiped the 40 man raid".
title: WoW Addicts Recovery Meeting
print_description: Miss raiding?  Want to talk about your DPS?  Come discuss, and have some delicious chocolate cake!

description: 10x20 wooden stage and stripper pole with a canopy! We have lots of shade n couches to watch. Requests will be taken, no guarantees what we'll do with them. This is not the biggest or the highest, but it is Yours! description:
Dare to participate in a a unique video art experience about soul mates and passion.  
Her Royal Highness Yasmina beckons the visually unique soul searchers to luxuriate in her kasbah of delights and partake in a sensual symphony of Arabian tastes, drinks, love poetry and song. There a renown photographer/film director will record your expressions of love and seduction in an extreme slow motion video portrait.  Return after night to witness these sacred videos of beauty and illuminated essence where time and minutiae expand, where the unobservable soul is projected for the Playa to see.

Later in the fall, go online to http://vimeo.com/channels/493603 to see yours and the other video portraits paired with your Burner soulmate.
title: Yasmina's Imaginarium: Slo-Motion Video Portraits
print_description: Join a video art piece about passion. In our Arabian tent, your gestures of love and seduction will be captured in a  slow motion video portrait.

description:
Also known as yogic sleep or sleep with awareness, Yoga Nidra is an ancient tantric practice that is intended to induce full-body relaxation and a deep meditative state of consciousness. 
Traditionally done in a lying down position Yoga Nidra is a systematic method of complete relaxation, holistically addressing our physiological, neurological, and subconscious needs.
Guided imagery and body scan techniques are used to take the practitioner into a deeply relaxed yet aware state. The practice will last 30 minutes. The practitioner begins by quieting the overactive conscious mind, then moves into a meditative state called pratyahara (withdrawal of the senses), gradually finding a state of “ultimate harmony,” in which the brain waves slow down and a subtle euphoria emerges.
title: Yoga Nidra Meditation
print_description: Yoga Nidra Meditation

description:
Women, goddesses, yoginis, mammas, maidens, crones and princesses of the Playa,

Come celebrate & relish in your feminine power, grace and softness with some gentle sunset yoga. All manifestations of the feminine are invited to join in this practice that will help you tone, open and tune into the pelvic floor, while connecting us with the vast array of pleasurable possibilities in this yummy part of our bodies. In addition to igniting the strength, suppleness and juiciness of our bodies, we'll also gather inspiration from each other to manifest our most wild, uninhibited, embodied and instinctual selves, bringing that energy into in the ways we move, breathe, dance, create, connect and play on and off the Playa.

Pregnant women of the Playa are especially encouraged to join and will be given appropriate modifications to support their growing bellies and babies.

No yoga experience required. You are encouraged to bring a mat, as well as a sarong, towel or scarf.

Meet behind the Temple (facing away from The Man).

Britt Fohrman gathers her depth of knowledge of the female reproductive system from over 12 years of work as a birth doula, as well as her expertise as a yoga teacher trained mostly in the Iyengar linage since 1993. Her HypnoBirthing childbirth education training and experience in witnessing peace and ease in birth has inspired her to apply these principles of visualization, meditation, breathing and affirmations to other aspects of women's health, particularly fertility and pelvic health. Her teaching style is warm, patient and focused on supporting each student to connect to the voice and abilities of their own body. In addition to training teachers in yoga for women, Britt has a full yoga teaching schedule that includes all kinds of therapeutic private sessions, Prenatal and Gentle Hatha weekly classes and monthly Restorative Yoga workshops. To view her schedule and to learn more about Britt and her practice, please visit: www.brittfohrman.com.
title: Yoni Yoga at the Temple
print_description: Celebrate & relish in your feminine power, instinct & softness through gentle yoga. Tune into the pelvic floor, while connecting to pleasure and ease.

description: Join us at Rhythm Wave for a gentle wake up call.  Ultra will help us rise and shine with lots of floor asana and grounding breath work.  In this yoga-for-dancers, expect to focus on stretching those hard working quads and hammies as well as loving up your feet.  Coordinating breath with movement we will find ourselves clearing the previous day's energy and setting intention for the day to come.  Ultra loves to offer easy chanting to draw energy into the body, we will end with a brief  relaxation and meditation.  Bring a mat or a towel to create a little layer between you and our one of a kind bamboo wood dance floor.  Led by RhythmWave's own Ultra (Julie Boone)
